Not sure if it was a card issue or camera issue so cannot knock it for that. Lots and lots of options, manual settings available, touch screen works better than I was expecting, flash is decent. Take the time and download the manual and actually read it, you will be much happier. Yes I would buy it again or as a gift for someone. Good value, good product. Register it online with Samsung and add 3 months to your warranty. Happy shooting!

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Kim Levesque
Reviews.Content: It takes great pictures! We were driving on the highway and I took some pics, and it looks like I was just standing there taking them. The zoom work well also. Good camera for a great price!

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: AlanK
Reviews.Content: Easy to use. Cant believe one can get so many  features for such a low price. Still learning it. I cant sync with samsung apps on ipads or iphone os7.  I took off one star for this reason

Reviews.Title: Easy to use
Reviews.Author: Jeff Van Domelen
Reviews.Content: Good value. Lots of special effect settings I will never use. The one that I could really use that it does not have is halftones, for screening a picture, say to reproduce on a copy machine.

Reviews.Title: very good
Reviews.Author: B. Aronna
Reviews.Content: It has exceeded my expectations.The battery is the weakest point in this camera. It DOES NOT hold up to the expected 300 pixs. The charge does not last for more than 170-180 and it drops totally quite suddenly.Colour rendition is outstanding; so is ease of use

Reviews.Title: Not Bad
Reviews.Author: Joey
Reviews.Content: It has a great 18X optical zoom and 90X digital zoom.The color is a bit dull, but it's fine if you have a software to adjust it.

Reviews.Title: Okay camera
Reviews.Author: Monnie
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my wife as a Christmas present since her other camera broke.  It has a ton of cool features, which I'm sure you've already read about them all, such as sending pics to Facebook, etc.Perhaps we haven't played around with the settings enough, but the pictures that we've taken with the camera don't seem all that great.  To be quite honest, the picture quality seems almost on par with some of the newer cellphones.  But I will fully admit we haven't had the camera that long, and perhaps we are using the wrong setting or something.  Just seems like the picture quality would be a lot better for a camera like this.

Reviews.Title: Awesome Camera A Awesome Price
Reviews.Author: DAVID NICHOLS II
Reviews.Content: Honestly one of the nicest cameras I have owned. It meets and exceeds expectations. Interesting to note that the direct mode does not require a WiFi router to connect to your mobile device for remote viewfinder or transfer.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Heather Hollander
Reviews.Content: So far nothing has changed my mind on this. LOVE being able to take video and pictures of certain shots of the video.

Reviews.Title: I found connecting up to wifi easy. If you want to transfer photos directly to ...
Reviews.Author: Gasmike91
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera to replace my Panasonic Lumix camera that had  been accidentally dropped onto a hard surface with the lens extended, needless to say the camera was broken and probably would cost about as much to repair it as to replace it. I wanted something with alot of bang for the buck, researched  using Consumer Reports.org and CNet reviews. Settled on this camera for having  a decent zoom 18X  and wifi, 14.2 mps and it has a touch screen which I find comes in handy and my Lumix had this feature as well.  I found connecting up to wifi easy. If you want to transfer photos directly to a tablet or a smart phone even when your  away from wifi  you can still do it. You need to have the Samsung camera app installed on your  device 1st, startup the wifi software on the camera, select the shown ip address on your tablet or  smartphone in the wifi panAl and  then you caan transfer from your camera to your device. I paid about $133 for  this camera and it came in a factory sealed box,  not a refurbished item. Very  happy with my purchase.

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: Dawn B.
Reviews.Content: I have had this camera a few weeks now, and I love it. the way you can zoom in on a subject is amazing. And since Ive gotten this camera I've had 3 people ask me what kind of camera it is because they love the pictures.

Reviews.Title: Looooove it!!
Reviews.Author: Toya
Reviews.Content: I am in love with this camera! I couldn't wait so I went to Best Buy and to my surprise I got the last one as an "open box" purchase for cheaper than it was originally listed for so win-win for me!! I love the cool new features this thing does and I love that I can use wi-fi to load my pictures on Facebook so quick and easily using my smartphone!  This camera is one of my favorites I've ever owned and I will definitely use it for every occasion! I would recommend this to someone who enjoys taking pictures and capturing memories with kids and family! :)

Reviews.Title: good things come in small packages
Reviews.Author: tina he
Reviews.Content: we purchased this camera for our 3 week vacation to New Zealand for Christmas 2013 and we were amazed by the quality of the pictures and all the different features. The best part is we could upload right to social media without fighting for the laptop!! major score!!!

Reviews.Title: More than satisfactory
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Photo and video are excellent for this price range camera.  It is compact and well suited for traveling.The controls are not placed to my liking, especially the on/off and the mic and speaker.  Getting to some of the more common functions takes some studying. Sending email is somewhat clunky and takes some getting used to and the keyboard could use some improvement.  The compartment door for the battery and SD card is pretty flimsy and would seem to be at risk.All-in-all, I would recommend this camera.

Reviews.Title: 14 MG Pixels wow
Reviews.Author: marylea ostle
Reviews.Content: This little camera packs a punch it is way better than my Nikon SLR D100 with just 5 MG pixels the only think you have to remember is to speak up for the volume and have plenty of light for the subject you want to film in a video. Videos have to be connected to the computer to be uploaded

Reviews.Title: I'm picky about photos -- photo quality is worse than some cell phones
Reviews.Author: Yarii
Reviews.Content: After my first Sony WX300 was accidentally dropped by a friend, I opted for this Samsung since it also had wi-fi and was cheaper than a replacement Sony. I'll be honest; I read many professional reviews online for the WB250F and most said this produced photos no better than a cell phone.....and I blew those reviews off as more than likely being too picky and/or not knowing what they were talking about.Those professional reviewers were right. The photos produced by this camera are NOT that great. They aren't sharp enough and the colors are dull even on the auto setting. This camera produces better videos than photos. I'd rather spend more money and get better photo quality since that's what I've been used to getting.Besides the crummy photo quality, I also thought the power on/off button was a little too sensitive or maybe in the wrong location as I turned it on twice by accident while trying to put it in my camera case.It's an easy camera to figure out - the touch screen is responsive and the wi-fi is easy to set up. It is quick to focus and fast to write to the card to take the next photo as long as you use a Class 10 SDHC card. I liked the manual pop-up flash too.This was returned and I purchased another Sony WX300. Sony DSC-WX300/B 18.2 MP Digital Camera with 20x Optical Image Stabilized Zoom and 3-Inch LCD (Black) Yes, the Sony is about $100 more than the Samsung but photo quality is very important to me.

Reviews.Title: GREAT camera!
Reviews.Author: CMac -Amazon Addict!
Reviews.Content: What a neat little gadget! I was looking for a Pocket camera, with a great zoom, and I found it in this little wonder! With a phenomenal zoom, and its touch screen menu - there are no limits to creativity and art inspired moments with this camera! My ONLY thought is that the camera takes a bit of time to get the zoom into focus. I have not taken any burst mode shots yet, but the auto intelligent mode, seems to be a little sluggish in focus time. If that is my only problem for such a tiny package, I think I'm doing okay, as the price and features are full on with this little guy! I'd buy it again, and certainly suggest it to friends!

Reviews.Title: Picture perfect
Reviews.Author: Ann O'Lone
Reviews.Content: Camera takes good pictures and is very easy to use.  The connectivity is seamless.  The anti-shake feature is quite helpful when trying to make sure of your pictures focus.

Reviews.Title: Nice camera
Reviews.Author: R. McGuire "mrbert"
Reviews.Content: Very good camera and connectivity to my phone and home Wi-Fi.  Enjoying and still exploring all the features as I learn to use them.

Reviews.Title: remain very satisfied
Reviews.Author: Omar
Reviews.Content: A great camera for users who do not want complicated, attractive photographs and get access them or share them through your phone or tablet computer. very good sharpness, beautiful photographs. remain very satisfied ..

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: windi kingbewe
Reviews.Content: the zoom is really good! the flash also.I like the quality and the shape of this camera, neither too big, nor too small, it has a perfect size.the quality of the pictures also are good, you can edit pictures.

Reviews.Title: Excelente
Reviews.Author: Diego
Reviews.Content: I seemed a wonderful camera. Very good easy to use design pictures are very good quality and best of all a low price.

Reviews.Title: great price fast shipping
Reviews.Author: michael hriciso
Reviews.Content: great price and fast shipping, the camera is easy to use and looks great, I already ordered a memory card for it and the picture quality is amazing.

Reviews.Title: great camera
Reviews.Author: Cathleen M.
Reviews.Content: love this little camera, takes great photos and very easy to use and post pictures on line. i would buy again.

Reviews.Title: Awesome Camera
Reviews.Author: James Burnett
Reviews.Content: Love our new camera so far. The zoom is great, love the wifi and touchscreen capabilities. Samsung did not disappoint.

Reviews.Title: Wow just can stop use! :)
Reviews.Author: Jade
Reviews.Content: Work great,the price is on believable. Recommend to anyone!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!The picture quality is great even in low light place,very easy to connect and share once there is a wifi spot

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: ken1042
Reviews.Content: Takes terrific pictures and videos.  Many extras included in the camera.  Well worth the price.I would recommend this item to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Barbara Irvine
Reviews.Content: I got this camera for my son's Xmas and asked him to rate it.  It appears to have exceeded his expectations and he is delighted with it.

Reviews.Title: I love this camera!
Reviews.Author: Randi S. Klein "Esquire1"
Reviews.Content: A friend of mine, who is in the business of selling cameras and camera equipment, suggested that I buy this camera. He told me I would fall in love with it, and he was right!First, I love the way the camera looks! I love the red color. Next, I love that I can instantly enlarge photos I have taken, and adjust the width and length of the pictures, right on the spot. That feature is not present with all digital cameras.There is so much more to learn about how to use this camera. I look forward to that learning process. This camera makes it fun!

Reviews.Title: Excellent point and shoot for the price
Reviews.Author: D. A. Paulon
Reviews.Content: I would have given the WB250F 3.5 or 4 stars based on its original retail price of $249 which would have been in line with the expert reviews.  However, at its current price around $129, the camera rightly deserves a 5 stars.  There is not a point and shoot camera on the market that can match the WB250F with all of its features for the price.Is price important?  Well, I would say absolutely if the quality is there.  For example, you can spend $698 on a Sony M100 II with a better sensor and lense, but that is a whopping $569 more than the WB250F.  Would most amateur photography tell the difference?  I doubt it, since for the most part, the Samsung WB250F takes excellent pictures.  This was the main criticism stated by the experts; the picture quality was a bit soft.  I have found no such problem.  The pictures are accurate and in focus.  There is a tendency for indoor shots to be a bit dull (faded) in color but  outdoor shots are fully saturated and crisp.What makes this camera a stand out are the features found in no other camera at this price point and they work.  I don't have a smart phone, but I did send pictures via WiFi to various email accounts with 100% success  Also, you can back up your photos on a laptop or other WiFi devices.The touch screen is outstanding with easy to understand instructions.Samsung has been in the electronics business for a long time, but I was a bit skeptical about its camera quality over my ZS5 Panasonic and Nixon D70 both of which I own.  I would honestly say, the Samsung WB250F holds its own in quality and exceeds both in features.

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: Melissa Booth
Reviews.Content: This camera is definitely a good bargain.  It has all of the features of a modern camera and also has built in wifi and has some cool features like the best face feature!!!!

Reviews.Title: Great for my use :)
Reviews.Author: sbadam
Reviews.Content: Very easy to use and the picture quality is very neat. Happy with the product. Meets my expectations of a simple and easy on the go to take pictures

Reviews.Title: Nicest Camera I've ever owned
Reviews.Author: Gordon S. Ferris
Reviews.Content: This is a very well made camera the build quality is great. It's very easy to set up and takes great photos. I haven't used the Wi-fi feature yet but I plan to try it out very soon. I like the touch screen and the 18X zoom will be perfect for the landscape shots I like to take. For the price it's hard to go wrong with this camera.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Nichole
Reviews.Content: My husband just bought me this camera as I did not want to haul my DSLR and all its lenses to the hospital when I deliver my second child. I have been playing with this camera for a while since getting it. NO flaws so far!

Reviews.Title: 99% of pictures are blurry
Reviews.Author: Mandy Canterbury
Reviews.Content: this is my first "advanced" digital camera, as i'm used to the $70 point and shoot canons. i'm still trying to get used to it, and it has many fun settings. however, i got it to take mostly inside pictures of my daughter playing. the action shot setting in inside lighting doesn't allow me to use the flash and is extremely dark photo. i had a professional photographer friend help me out with it, and she didn't understand why it won't allow a flash on most settings. the only setting i've found that does great pictures is the beauty setting, and that's only if i get lucky when everyone is sitting still. i've played around with shutter speeds, and everything else i could think of, not being able to get a good clear action shot inside. this camera may be too much blur for my liking. i'll try it a couple more days, but it seems to be looking more like returning this and going back to the cheaper canon. of course this is just my opinion, and might be more of "it's not the camera, it's the user" issue, but for anyone else like me that doesn't know too much about cameras and want to use for the same purpose, i'd reccomend to keep looking,

Reviews.Title: Flimsy flash
Reviews.Author: Catherine
Reviews.Content: I purchased this for my daughters birthday, seller shipped quickly, the quality of the pictures is great. She is thrilled with the Wi-Fi feature, I am concerned with the flash it comes up quite easily but you have to manually push it back in, flimsy.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Regina Sabia
Reviews.Content: The best camera is the one u have with u and this is small enuf to take anywhere.  Great pictures but gave it a four because the opening and closing of the lens absolutely eats the battery time.  Make sure u have an extra battery with u.

Reviews.Title: Fragile Flash?
Reviews.Author: Red
Reviews.Content: Great camera, takes amazing pictures... My only complaint is I feel like I'm going to break the flash portion off by not remembering to close it.. Should have done my research as this probably isn't the best camera for me

Reviews.Title: Easy to use with great zoom
Reviews.Author: Nicki Troia
Reviews.Content: easy to use; choose control using buttons or touch screen; amazing zoom - took some great shots at Hoover Dam.

Reviews.Title: great wifi enabled device.
Reviews.Author: Angela S.
Reviews.Content: Great point and click camera with quick wifi upload. We used this on our trip to France and captured wonderful memories.

Reviews.Title: Great Price SAMSUNG Digital Camera
Reviews.Author: Mike2so  Silicon Valley Native
Reviews.Content: I love this camera. It's a great in your pocket camera and better then any Phone camera. You can do what you need with it as long as you have Battery life. So make sure you invest in a extra one. these come with special small batteries that are not cheap but it's worth it anyway. Video is real HD good. lot's of settings.

Reviews.Title: very good product
Reviews.Author: ALEXIS JESUS IZQUIEL MASABE
Reviews.Content: I loved the product they recommend the videos the photos are spectacular and the zoon not disappoint, guaranteed.Keep in mind that is as easy to use

Reviews.Title: great camera for price
Reviews.Author: Lindsay M. Beyer
Reviews.Content: Awesome camera for under $200.00. Good value for a novice photographer. Camera has really good zoom for the price of it.

Reviews.Title: Great camera!
Reviews.Author: Greg R Rice
Reviews.Content: Great camera for the money. Took it to Arizona on a trip to Monument Valley and the Grand Canyon. Got some amazing shots.Camera came with a very limited instruction booklet. I am still trying to figure out how to download pics to my PC.

Reviews.Title: Best one yet
Reviews.Author: Carol McClure
Reviews.Content: This has been the best camera I have owned for shooting video. Takes great stills as well. It definitely does not disappoint.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera!
Reviews.Author: tammy telleen
Reviews.Content: I love Samsung.  This is my 2nd camera I bought thru Amazon. Best prices!  Easy to use.  Best picture and video.

Reviews.Title: Best Point&Shoot; I've every owned!
Reviews.Author: JonandDiane
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for 2 reasons: megazoom & improved low-light performance specifically for shots on our honeymoon at Burning Man.  It vastly exceeded my expectations on both fronts!  Daylight images seem to take a little tweaking for color once home, but are still very impressive.  This is one very satisfied customer!

Reviews.Title: Speechless
Reviews.Author: Danteandroid4life
Reviews.Content: I love this damn camera. I didnt take any pictures yet but the video side i use for a 4 hour recording. OMG.. This camera do everything  I need it to do but one thing. The wifi upload to youtube is limited. small files only. Overall I love this camera. Samsung did it again... Forget DSLR. Im going with a WIFI wireless viewfinder... Amazing!!!

Reviews.Title: Impressed
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I bought this for a recent trip to NYC.  I usually shoot with a DSLR and so am not typically impressed with point and shoot photos.  This camera, however, does an excellent job.  The pictures were clear, sharp, and had rich color quality.  It also did an impressive job of taking night shots using 3200 ISO.  Both noise levels and graininess were comparable to a lot DSLRs.  The wireless feature also made it easy to back up photos to my tablet during the trip.  I must admit I'm not really into the touch screen feature but was glad to see that features can be accessed through regular menus so your LCD doesn't have to be covered in smudges.  My only concern in the pop-up flash.  It feels very flimsy, and I don't think it would take much to break off.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Perry Carmichael "pc"
Reviews.Content: I got this for my wife because the old Panasonic that we have had for years is slow to focus. This camera is much faster to focus and allows her to take puppy pictures easily in the house where the light is low. Pano stitching work great and is fun to use, size is nice and form works well in our hands. Just a nice all round camera that I would get again if needed.

Reviews.Title: Best Camera
Reviews.Author: Susan M.
Reviews.Content: I love my new Samsung camera!! It takes the most amazing pictures and the 18X zoom is fantastic. When taking pictures at a concert, the zoom capability makes it seem like we were in the first 10 rows!!!!

Reviews.Title: Easy to use
Reviews.Author: Rose I
Reviews.Content: I took this camera on a trip to Europe and it took wonderful pictures.  I didn't get to try many of the settings but look forward to experimenting with them now.  Certainly easy to use with touch screen and easy to follow directions on the camera.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Paula Aguirre
Reviews.Content: Exactly as described, works perfectly! Just love it! Took it for a trip ti disney with the family and it just surpassed. My expectations. Thanks a lot!

Reviews.Title: Inexpensive but not a keeper (for me anyway)
Reviews.Author: T. Nelson
Reviews.Content: I had this camera a few days and it was OK but not great.  I did some side-by-side tests with an old Sony DSC HX5V and printed the results.  In some cases the Samsung pictures were a little better, in some cases a little worse.  I didn't have a single picture that made me say "Wow, that's a great picture!"I was hoping that even though it's a cheaper camera, the fact that it was 3-4 years newer than the Sony would have resulted in better image quality.  In general it did not.Some pros:The WiFi features are cool and are the real reason I bought the camera.  They generally worked although YouTube blocked connections from this camera as "suspicious."  I had the same issue with a Blu Ray player that had YouTube connectivity.  Google is apparently pretty aggressive in blocking connections that don't come through a browser.Some cons:The flash button is fiddly.  Sometimes it took several hard presses to get it to pop up.  The auto-focus can be really slow, sometimes even in good lighting.  On numerous occasions it wouldn't lock focus at all, even outside during the day.  That prompted me to return the camera.On returning the camera, I ran into an issue.  All your personal logins -- email, Facebook, YouTube, WiFi, etc. -- are permanently stored in the camera.  Doing a reset from the settings menu erases the WiFi login but nothing else.  I contacted Samsung customer service and the rep told me there was no way to erase them.  I asked if there was a way to do a factory reset and he said "no."A few days later I contacted Samsung again and got directions from a different person.  In case you ever need them, here they are:1. Power up the camera. Set the dial to Auto as if you were going to take a picture.2. Zoom to the widest setting, then press the shutter button simultaneously for a couple of seconds.3. Power off.4. Power back up to confirm your settings are deleted.This will erase all your login info (facebook, email, etc.).  You will still need to erase your WiFi password.  To do this, set the dial to "settings" (the gear icon) and there is a "reset" option in the menus.  This will delete your Wifi password.Inconvenient, but ultimately it all worked out OK.So...the camera is cheap but the performance isn't very impressive.  Maybe good for some but it didn't meet my particular needs.

Reviews.Title: Good Camera on a Budget
Reviews.Author: Jore
Reviews.Content: I wanted a camera that I could take with me when I don't feel like taking my DSLR. I had a Sony DSC-WX50 and loved it but misplaced it when I moved and was heading on a trip so wanted to get something to take with me. I own Samsung TV's and our cell phones/tablets are Samsung and even our fridge is Samsung and love them so decided to take a chance on the the WB250F. The fact that it had wifi capabilities was a selling point for me. Being able to instantly transfer pics to our phones and tablets was great. I can even instantly view pics on my TV. Technology nowadays is just overwhelming sometimes. Anyhow, the camera takes great pics except in low light. Maybe 5 out of 10 pics in low light are good. When there's ample light the pictures are great however. The outer shell is made of plastic which was expected with Samsung products but it does feel solid. It is a little bigger than most compact cameras. Battery life is not great but decent. My Sony DSC-WX50 and my DSLR can go alot longer before needed charging. I think the battery drains alot faster when your using the wifi.Overall the this camera is good for the price. I was just looking for something small to bring occasionally instead of my DSLR and this fit my bill. Its not the most advance point-and-shoot but for the wifi capabilities and great pics (not low light), I recommend. The low light picture quality and the battery life was the reason for only 4 stars, otherwise I would have given 5.EDIT 12/30/13: The low light picture quality bothers me a bit. I guess I'm just so used to DSLR low light quality. Overall its a great budget camera with wifi capabilities. I've decided to return this however and spend a little more for to get a camera with excellent low light images. I do still recommend this.

Reviews.Title: Nice camera; no owner's manual
Reviews.Author: lyfeizgude "Scotty"
Reviews.Content: I like the camera, with one "but".  It takes clear pictures, the zoom is good, the cropping feature is handy, and it's nice and compact.  The "but"?  But, it does not come with an owner's manual, only a quick start guide which does not come close to explaining the finer details of the camera.  You can see the manual online (rather impractical when you're out and about), you can print your own (over 160 pages), you can buy one ($42 dollars), or you can sit on the beach and fiddle with the thing until you figure out what you need to figure out (maybe).  So, I think you'll like the camera, but I don't like the fact that it does not come with a manual.

Reviews.Title: Samsung WB250F Camera
Reviews.Author: Gillian Eastwood
Reviews.Content: I've had numerous problems with this camera.It can take some nice photos however overall it seems shoddily put together and the housing is weak, sometimes to point that the flash is obstructed and doesn't always pop up when needed.Slow to view photos.The lever holding the battery in place broke within the first 2 months.Great zoom but only if you can keep it perfectly still or have a tripod, otherwise very easy blurred and you can rarely zoom out beyond x5

Reviews.Title: Camera has glitches
Reviews.Author: MICHELLE D.
Reviews.Content: The first WB250F I ordered started off working fine.  I took it on a weekend vacation to test its functionality ahead of a big trip to Hawaii.  I'm glad I did because after a day I had problems with the camera.  It froze up when trying to switch between modes and if I turned it off then back on, it would automatically take a picture.  I returned it without hassle and ordered a second version.  I had decided to return it as well because the on/off button on the top of the camera is so sensitive, it turns on in my purse and the battery runs down.  Disappointing because the picture quality, pricing, and size of camera were just perfect.

Reviews.Title: Samsung WB250F - great camera
Reviews.Author: Cathy S "Cathy"
Reviews.Content: This camera replaced a Sony HX9V that became unusable and unrepairable during normal use. Shame on Sony.  The Samsung WB250F is very easy to use and has good button placement and easy menus. The manually popped up flash is not an issue as the Sony auto pop up flash was very unreliable. I have taken great pictures of the moon in manual mode without a tripod. I especially like the grip for one handed photographs. The Auto Backup is nice to save photos into my PC over WiFi. The long optical zoom brings things right up "close and personal". The colors in all my photos and videos have come out very natural and appears exactly what I see with my eyes.

Reviews.Title: Excellent choice!
Reviews.Author: Maine IT
Reviews.Content: An excellent choice for someone who wants a basic camera with great quality pictures.  I use it for telephoto shots of birds and animals and it does not let me down.  People who have seen the pictures frequently remark on the clarity.  Samsung does not emphasize enough that the optical 18X  and the digital 5X yields a 90X telephoto.  Although at a lesser magnification, I can get a clear video of a squirrel at 100 feet that is Impressive.  My only "con" is that their is no compatible app for the iPad available.

Reviews.Title: Seems easy to use and picture quality is good.
Reviews.Author: Jac
Reviews.Content: I bought it for my mother, who wants to take photos to post to Facebook.This camera is pretty intuitive and easy to use.The only difficulty is figuring out how to save photos via wifi to iPhoto, dropbox or any other photo album.I could not get the camera to recognize the Samsung app installed on an iPad.Otherwise, a good camera.

Reviews.Title: Good camera for the price
Reviews.Author: Bootquest
Reviews.Content: I upgraded to this camera from an older Cannon Elph that had come to the end of it's days.  I purchased the Samsung for a few different reasons and it has mostly met my expectations.  It is wi-fi capable and had a better price point than other wi-fi cameras.  Having used the wi-fi several times now I would say it's functional but not great.  You can download an app for iphone or smartphone and the camera can send a picture to said phone but it takes a few steps to do it and it's not seamless, especially after a few drinks;)  Still it works.  One thing that irritates me is the Slow power up.  It takes the camera a good 5 or 6 seconds to go from off to being ready to take a photo because of the touchscreen.  Not a deal breaker but it's annoying.  Also the flash is manual on this camera.  You have to push a release button on top of the camera to allow the flash to pop up and the first hundred photos I took I had to retake because I forgot the flash wasn't automatic.  The only other small complaint would be that the function control knob on top of the camera is loose and spins around at the slightest touch.  If you put it in your pocket, it will wind up on another setting.  Other than those few slight complaints, I like this camera.  It takes great photos and the screen is bright and crisp.  Good Luck and I hope you enjoy.

Reviews.Title: Don't recommend getting this camera
Reviews.Author: halynam
Reviews.Content: I got this camera 3 weeks ago and ended up returning it. It's the biggest piece of junk I've ever owned. I have used a dslr canon rebel for the last 5 years and just wanted a good point and shoot on the side. The quality of the pictures (although decent looking on the camera screen) is absolutely terrible when viewed on a computer. And though the camera does have lots of different options it really doesn't matter when most pictures taken are blurry, out of focus and just plain bad..I went back to Best Buy and got a Nikon COOLPIX S9500 and I am much happier with the quality. Quite honestly other than owning a dslr it is the best quality I've had experience with so far.

Reviews.Title: Poor picture quality
Reviews.Author: Gary Talbott
Reviews.Content: This camera has a lot of bells and whistles which is why I bought it, but honestly my wife's iPhone 5 takes better pictures. Picasa web albums cloud upload didn't work because Google saw the camera as an unsecure device trying to hack into my account which forced me to change my password...grrrrr.  Maybe a firmware upgrade will fix this. I'm returning the camera.

Reviews.Title: very impressive camera
Reviews.Author: Leonard
Reviews.Content: Let's say I'm not very camera friendly, I can run rings around people on a puter but hand me a camera and don't leave me alone.  lol  I wanted to upgrade from my lumix, it's a decent camera for what I paid, today it's out dated.I looked and went to stores and tried many, most were hard to operate meaning to vague features, since my lumix had auto settings I wanted something similar for us brain dead camera buffs. I found the Samsung WB250F, what a gem. it's super easy to use, darn near everything is automatic, I bought it and had it sent to my daughters home which is on the east coast (because I was going on vacation to visit her), I live in Wi.  I wish I could upload pics to here, they were simply beautiful, I took some from inside the car which was moving, some at night with no flash, these are beautiful pics. many might say well this is good, that is good, maybe but can someone like me operate it without a degree in photography? if your looking for an easy to use camera and suck at taking photo's like I do, this is the one for you.I bought it here on Amazon, had super fast service, no hassels etc. wish I had bought it earlier.even the wifi is for brain dead folks, easy to use. this is a steal of a camera for the brain dead and the 20X zoomis a super big plus, my last one had a 8X, give this a shot, you'll be glad you did, honestly!  It will also easily fit in your pants pocket.

Reviews.Title: NICE PICS WITH SOME SHORTCOMINGS
Reviews.Author: Bernadette Hilway "BH"
Reviews.Content: It takes nice pictures, however, the placement of the buttons sometimes interferes with picture taking. WIFI capability is great and works well. However, for some unknown reason, it will not connect to my guest account. It will only connect to my admin account.  Also, the camera is only a few months old and the markings on the buttons are wearing off!

Reviews.Title: Stopped working in the middle of our trip
Reviews.Author: MIRA BEN-TZUR
Reviews.Content: We took it to a long trip abroad. For few times the zoom lens got stuck, but we managed to release it by following the suggestion on the screen (shut it down, take out the battery and reinsert). But then came the time, in the middle of our trip, that it got stuck and refused to get back to normal operation for several days. Then all of a sudden it is ok again. In short, completely unreliable camera! I wish I could return it but too much time passed, due to the length of our trip. I contacted Samsung and they were unwilling to replace it with a new camera. This is much for a service...

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: megan Tudryn
Reviews.Content: I love that I can upload to facebook or email right from the camera. I wish it could record videos as well

Reviews.Title: Quite nice device
Reviews.Author: Carlos Garcia
Reviews.Content: This camera meets all the expectations for a point-and-shot device. Compact and easily transportable. Even, it seems a lintel fragile, specially the flash

Reviews.Title: ok, but i'm returning
Reviews.Author: M. Szczepanski "meglet71"
Reviews.Content: I have a Samsung Galaxy 2 phone and it takes really good pictures, for a phone,  in natural light and w/ no movement.  The colors, such as fall foliage, wasn't always accurate. I was looking for a camera that worked in low light, took movement pictures, and took pictures with vibrant colors.  I was disappointed that the pictures were only as good as my phone and sometime not even as good.  It did definitely take better movement pictures...but that was about it.  I will say, that I am a novice w/ cameras so maybe there were some settings that would have made it work better.  But sometimes even on the auto setting, I had to push the button several times before it took a picture.  Disappointed, especially since I love all of our other Samsung devices.

Reviews.Title: Very pleased! Expectations met.
Reviews.Author: Tara Creighton
Reviews.Content: I chose Samsung because I was very pleased with the picture quality on my phone & tablet. The camera has proven to work just as well. I have already used it several times for waterfalls, fireworks, indoors, close ups, action, super moon gazing, etc. Excellent picture quality & enough zoom for the things I do (hiking, kids' sporting events). Moblie Link / wifi is very easy to use & none of the features have required excessive research of the manual. Was also very pleased with the price for all it's capabilities.

Reviews.Title: Great point and shoot
Reviews.Author: Bekktek
Reviews.Content: I'm very happy with this little camera! It's not a dslr,  but I love having wifi and the ability to send the photos right to my phone. Some of the menus aren't the most intuitive, but once you use it you'll figure it out.This is a great camera for vacation, and I used it with some pc software to take some great family portraits.  I like the action shot, I use it to get baseball shots... Overall, this is a great point and shoot camera.

Reviews.Title: WARNING: Do not buy!!!! Waste of Money READ HERE
Reviews.Author: Drew
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera at my local electronics store and was looking forward to a decent camera for the price. This camera feels awkward when you hold it and the resolution is UNBELIEVABLY bad.Almost every time I even attempt to use the zoom feature, there is tons of distortion and the menu itself is hard to navigate!I couldn't figure out how to upload video, which was annoying and it takes an eternity just to try and change a setting for any part of the camera.Overall, my experience with this camera was horrible, which is why I took the time to find a QUALITY camera that will last and be friendly to use. Luckily, after searching for weeks, I finally settled on a camera I love! I have used it for just over a month now and the difference in picture quality and overall function is amazing.If you'd like to take a look at this camera GO HERE -------> http://amzn.to/1okZUPVIt is here on Amazon and you won't be dissappointed, I promise!

Reviews.Title: SIMPLE TO OPERATE
Reviews.Author: Bob S.
Reviews.Content: Nice little camera big viewing screen nice sized zoom very easy to download pics to computer. Most importantly my wife LOVES it!

Reviews.Title: Great camera for the money.
Reviews.Author: Shelby summey
Reviews.Content: Great camera for the price. Easy to use, the pictures are clear and beautiful, the wifi is easy to set up. Can send pictures to your Facebook page. The same camera is $ 237.00 at Wal-Mart so this is really a wonderful price. You will not be disappointed if you buy this camera!

Reviews.Title: Totally love the WB250F Samsung camera
Reviews.Author: Nancy E. Jester
Reviews.Content: This camera does everything and does it well. The HD videos are amazing; the photos are outstanding. Highly recommend this camera. Plus the price is very reasonable.

Reviews.Title: Great camera in small package.
Reviews.Author: C5 owner
Reviews.Content: Takes excellent pictures that be sent by e-mail using wifi.  The main reason I purchased this camera.  Very satisfied with this product.

Reviews.Title: A Smart & Sharp Little Camera
Reviews.Author: M. Miles "buy1sell1"
Reviews.Content: I needed a digital camera that had better zoom capabilities than the one I had so I bought this. Good quality pictures. It operates like the Fujifilm camera it replaced.It does not come with a memory card and I did not see anywhere in the product description that it wasn't included. So as soon as I received it I had to go to BestBuy and pay $15 for memory.And, no owner's manual was included. You have to get online and download it or logon every time you have a question about the camera's operation.They are cutting corners to save money so that they can sell the products cheaper but they're cutting off their nose to spite their face by making people immediately have to go out and buy something in order to use the product and to have to create their own user's manual to carry with them. So they lose a star for those deficiencies. Pretty soon they won't include a lens or a button to operate it.

Reviews.Title: Can't beat it for the money
Reviews.Author: Jay C.
Reviews.Content: This is a great little camera. It doesn't need as much light as my older cameras so I can usually take pictures in the house without a flash, which look more natural. My only complaint is that the zoom is a little slow responding, but after using it for a brief time I got used to it and its really not a problem anymore. The 18x zoom is very useful at times when you can't get close enough to take a picture up close. Great product!

Reviews.Title: love the camera
Reviews.Author: Ida Blanck
Reviews.Content: But I would have liked a booklet with it. Paper received not very clear. Needed to know more about the camera. Do you have a booklet you can send me?

Reviews.Title: Excellent product
Reviews.Author: diego oviedo
Reviews.Content: Excellent product, it met my expectations. does the job and is very economical. It is a 100% recommended. is a good option.

Reviews.Title: Awesome Little Camera
Reviews.Author: Venge
Reviews.Content: Overall this little beast is well worth the money.Let me first say, I am far from being a professional photographer, although with a good camera I do fairly well.While there are a few points that could be improved upon, the pros out weigh the cons by far, in my opinion.First the bad stuff:Like some of the other reviewers I found the wifi clumsy - far easier to hook in hard wire to upload than deal with the built in wifi - at least for me.The auto focus is ridiculous at high zoom - almost funny.  At lower zoom it works fine.Picture quality is so-so.Now for the good:The menus screens are simple and easy to navigate.The video is awesomeThe sound on the video spectacular.Let me go into detail.  While I am no photographer, I do dabble at making safety videos for work.  This camera's video capability (1080)  far exceeds the 720p of my smaller HD video camera I usually use for these videos.  I was working on sound bits at home, realizing I forgot to take my mic from work, I was about to give up for the night when it dawned on me I had the camera handy.  The sound was clear as a bell.So, even though it wasn't purchased for the video exclusively, the quality in that area - for me anyway - makes up for the deficiencies in the other.Let me stress... it doesn't take bad pictures, they just aren't great.

Reviews.Title: do like this camera
Reviews.Author: Marjorie G.
Reviews.Content: love the 3" screen (as you get older the screen's gotta be bigger)very good value for the features-relatively easy to figure out how to use the features as explained on  the screen

Reviews.Title: Good camera for the money
Reviews.Author: Tabasco24 "The Cheese"
Reviews.Content: Ok, the only thing that really bothers me about this camera, is its inability to compensate for movement. If the person holding the camera moves even the slightest bit, the picture will be blurry, so it's got to rest on something, which necessitates a tripod.Wifi feature works great with my iPad mini. Video is pretty good, though that's not what I bought it for.Zoom is surprisingly good.If you've got a steady hand or a tripod, you should definitely get this camera. This much camera will usually cost double the price.

Reviews.Title: Well worth the price.
Reviews.Author: Joe
Reviews.Content: I don't care what any of the others say. I'm here to tell u that this camera is well worth the little they ask for it. Just stared playing with it and I love it.

Reviews.Title: great camera
Reviews.Author: martin
Reviews.Content: This camera is so easy to function and very easy to pair with my tablet to sync pics wirelessly. Great quality pictures :-) I would recommend this camera for anyone it's that simple to use

Reviews.Title: If you want this for Autoshare geotagging (gps), the US version of the iPhone app can't do it.
Reviews.Author: Bill Barrick
Reviews.Content: It's a really nice point-and-shoot and i'd love it for that but the sales lit that says you can Autoshare pics to your iPhone and the Samsung SmartCameraApp will use the iPhone's GPS to tag appears to be untrue. I spent about 40 minutes online with Samsung on this and they finally admitted the app doesn't work. So--if you don't care about the geotagging (or maybe it works with Samsung's own Android devices) it's a really nice point-and-shoot.

Reviews.Title: not top of the line but nevertheless it is a great camera for the price
Reviews.Author: Bruce W Hueseman
Reviews.Content: I like the WIFI capability and it works quite well  still I feel my samsung S4 phone takes better pics but this is a good camera.

Reviews.Title: Seems to take ok pictures but....
Reviews.Author: Joanne Hinson
Reviews.Content: It could use better directions, I had to figure out which memory card to use (its not mentioned anywhere), and I dont like where they have the zoom, it impedes ease of use.

Reviews.Title: Nice camera, wrong power cord
Reviews.Author: J. Nelson
Reviews.Content: The camera did not come with a US AC charger cable, which is disappointing. The AC cord was for another countries electrical outlet, which means the camera was actually not a US model. That is NOT in the description and I purchased this as a gift.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: burgoyne28
Reviews.Content: Love this camera.  It synced perfectly with my Samsung 3.  Great quality pictures and love that it is small enough to fit in a pocket or purse when I don't want to bring my DSLR.

Reviews.Title: Awesome product!
Reviews.Author: Jonathan
Reviews.Content: This is an awesome point and shoot camera. It can also record in 1080p HD and it's really good. I bought this product mainly because of its18x zoom and it's rechargeable battery and I was not disappointed. Highly recommend it!

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Amy E. Wolchanski "NATIONAL PRODUCT FAN!!!"
Reviews.Content: For the amateur photographer who is basically just taking vacation and family photos, this is a great camera. It is very user friendly. We loved the touch screen in the back. It will also perform all of the features without the touchscreen, just incase you break it sometime in the future. Zoom is great, and was the motivation for buying this camera.It produces clear, crisp shots even when zoomed in all the way.Wonderful item and the price is more than reasonable.I would buy again.

Reviews.Title: Nice
Reviews.Author: Keith Burriss
Reviews.Content: Great Choice Great choice. Better that I expected. They are well made and I think they will last. Just what I was looking for. Takes great pictures

Reviews.Title: Great camera for a decent price
Reviews.Author: Rayandkim
Reviews.Content: Very happy with this...fun trying out all of the features!  Love the wifi options.  Great price for all that you get

Reviews.Title: Love this camera!
Reviews.Author: Kelly Wicklund
Reviews.Content: This camera is definitely a great bargain for the price.  It takes good pictures as well as video.  I have previously had a small HD video camera which did a nice job, but wanted a camera that took good pictures and good video.  This camera fits the bill.  It does take a little practicing  to find all the neat things it will do.  I have used the e-mail feature to send a picture to a computer and it works well.  I haven't tried sending to smart phone, yet, as I don't have one, but expect that it would work as well.  The Best Face and Continuous Shots are great for taking shots of grandkids.  Another feature is that while taking pictures you can just push a button and get video--no turning the dial to change.  I love it!

Reviews.Title: Great camera! Great price!
Reviews.Author: Jessica Stutmann
Reviews.Content: Great camera! Great price!  Love this camera picture quality is great... Easy to use in auto mode haven't done anything fancy with it yet but it seems to have tons of options

Reviews.Title: I am not a professional but camera is easy to use and takes great pictures!
Reviews.Author: Dorothy J. Burk
Reviews.Content: Camera is easy to use right our of the box. I had no problem setting up the wifi. I just followed enclosed instructions. Camera foes not come with rapid charger I suggest you buy one but not the big John deal suggested after 3 charges it did not work in the camera .

Reviews.Title: Had to return it
Reviews.Author: Elena Castaneda Ezcurra
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera mainly because it had the Wi-Fi features but I tried several times to upload some pictures to picasa but it did not work, could not send the pic to my email. In summarry: much more complicated to use the Wi-Fi features than I thought (and that was the only reason I selected this camera) After I return it I read other reviews of people who state also they could not upload/send pictures to internet or at least it did not work as easily as one expects.

Reviews.Title: So far So Good
Reviews.Author: Sherry Noppe "Shopper"
Reviews.Content: Bought this for work to take pictures of what we ship out.So far the pictures are great.  Comes with a mb flash carddoesn't hold many pictures.

Reviews.Title: good camera
Reviews.Author: serg
Reviews.Content: pretty good camera, it's nice and works well, and it has a decent price with several ways to take cool pics

Reviews.Title: LOVE it!
Reviews.Author: GaryTucson
Reviews.Content: I usually write more comprehensive reviews, but since this camera has all the specs and details you need on the Amazon site, I'm keeping it simple. I LOVE it! It takes perfect photos, is ultra easy to use, does everything it's supposed to do, is compact enough to slip in my pocket yet takes photos like one with a huge lens mount, and I LOVE the touch-screen and the fact that I can simply turn the function wheel to Wi-Fi, put it on my desk, press the icon on the screen and download the newest photos directly to my computer without swapping the SD card or plugging it in. BIG perks in a small package - convenient, super easy to use and attractive. What more could you ask for (except maybe not having paid $30 more for it than it now costs from the same source, but that's the way Amazon works - no biggie)

Reviews.Title: Works for me
Reviews.Author: GaryInCSCO
Reviews.Content: The Samsung WB250F is working well for me.Menu selections on digital cameras confuse me and I am still learning how to use the menu interface on this camera.The on-screen menu selections seem to help.I have had good success taking indoor pictures without the flash.The video feature works well also. I need to get used to the lag in the zoom feature while I am shooting videos.The view screen is not bright in outdoor sunlight. I have missed a few action shots because I have had to just aim and click without being able to see the object on screen. I haven't found how to adjust brightness in the menu setup yet.I like the continuous shots feature for action shots, but I would like the processing and recovery time to be quicker.For a pocket camera for casual use, I would buy it again.

Reviews.Title: Excellent carema for the price
Reviews.Author: Darrell P.
Reviews.Content: You can't beat this camera for the price. It takes great pictures and has built-in WIFI, what else can I say ?

Reviews.Title: Samsung easy to use Camera
Reviews.Author: george arthur
Reviews.Content: Easy to use and simple features makes this a winner for me. Don't like complicated gadgets. Picture and video quality good for this price range. Very satisfied with this camera..

Reviews.Title: Great Little Camera
Reviews.Author: Gene Goodell
Reviews.Content: I bought one of these to take to Hawaii this year.  GREAT little camera!  See pic:  http://goo.gl/xXW41jVery cool that it syncs with my Samsung Galaxy 4 phone as well.  I can take pics and have it automatically sync to phone and then the cloud, or take pics and then "bulk" upload them to my phone / cloud later on.  Either way, super handy and pretty darned good pics for under $150!

Reviews.Title: Great Digital camera
Reviews.Author: jimmy garza
Reviews.Content: Great camera mothersday gift for my wife,but I"m using it more! Also arrived on time!!Will buy from you again.My wife also liked it.!!!

Reviews.Title: Great pics, flash terrible design!!!
Reviews.Author: Fabian Agudelo
Reviews.Content: What was this flash designed in the 80's? It pops up like a really corny electronic from the 80's movies "Short Circuit" or "Batteries Not Included". The quality of pictures is ok. Lots of features, but a pain to setup and navigate. I miss my Sony which had easy menus, quick flash, and equal or better picture quality and zoom.

Reviews.Title: Very good camera for the price!!!
Reviews.Author: Bino_10
Reviews.Content: We were very happy with the camera but had a few minor issues that were very annoying during our trip. There was a long delay while zooming in on pics and every so often the camera would take blurry photos for no reason. We'd turn the camera off and then back on and that seemed to correct the issue. We haven't had the camera long so maybe there's something in the manual that will explain these issues better. Overall, happy with the pics and camera.

Reviews.Title: Easy to use!
Reviews.Author: saving consumer "save"
Reviews.Content: So far I love this camera as it is extremely easy to use especially the wifi with sending pictures to my email and smart phone. This is exactly why I bought it and so far it is effortless to use the wifi. I have only had the camera a month but so far my pictures are very nice and I highly rate the ease of use.

Reviews.Title: A MOST HAVE FOR DIGITAL PHOTOS.
Reviews.Author: johnny serrano
Reviews.Content: Wonderful feature for the digital camera, it works as it's design. I love it. Able to transfer .com picture to my album on the computer.

Reviews.Title: I love it
Reviews.Author: MOONCHOUNG CHOI
Reviews.Content: good

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Tammy Ray
Reviews.Content: I am getting familiar with my new toy and it is always a little frustrating when the manuel is very VAGUE. I would like more info and will be seeking it online soon.  Tell ya again in the fall how I like my new "toy"

Reviews.Title: Amazing!
Reviews.Author: andrew
Reviews.Content: Out of all the cameras I have had, this is the best one! I love how you can instantly share your photos and videos to social networks straight from the camera. I would recommend this camera for whoever wants a camera that can take high quality pictures and videos in a small size and instantly sharing them!

Reviews.Title: Samsung WB250F digital camera
Reviews.Author: tam60
Reviews.Content: Excellent camera over all takes great pictures easy to use but one flaw with this camera don't buy it thinking it is easy to transmit your pictures to your email with the Wi-Fi it does not work. There is no way to send it to your email for some reason it will be blocked by yahoo mail you can send it to facebook but not everyone wants all there pictures on facebook!

Reviews.Title: Great Camera excellent feature
Reviews.Author: Willie Mitchell
Reviews.Content: I love this camera, it is light weight large viewing, and wireless make it convenient to share at no expense.

Reviews.Title: Excellent camera
Reviews.Author: Maithe
Reviews.Content: The camera is excellent. It takes photos like a semi pro camera. Zoom works perfectly and the options of smart and automatic are as beyond as expected. It's not a super fast camera (specially zoom it's a little bit slow). In average I love it!

Reviews.Title: Great Quaility photos..clear zoom..just as advertised!!!
Reviews.Author: ruth
Reviews.Content: I really do love this camera...the photos are perfect and the zoom is as clear as stated. A proper manual for this can be found at this link..[...]..Shipping was also ok ...i am satisfied at the moment no complaints for me thus far.....

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Farns418
Reviews.Content: My wife got this for my birthday and I love how easy it is to use, the wifi posting to facebook saves me so much time! Great quality pictures in a nice compact frame, excellent camera and an easy item to recommend!I got so use to using my iPhone, I had forgotten how nice pictures could look.

Reviews.Title: Easy Peasy
Reviews.Author: C. Curtiss
Reviews.Content: This is sweet!  Dummy user yet it was easy to share the photos without hassle.  Works great, nice pictures.  Would recommend

Reviews.Title: Absolutely great camera
Reviews.Author: paula
Reviews.Content: I was looking for digital compact camera at a reasonable price, light weight and have WiFi.  This one is perfect.  There are newer model that cost about $150-$200 more for 21x Zoom and little higher MP but it will be way too much which I don't need.  The extra money can be used to buy other items.  There are so many (-) and (+) reviews, but for me it's 5 stars for what I need.  I don't plan to be professional photographer anytime soon.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Rick Brewer
Reviews.Content: Had been using a Nikon for business. This camera works so much faster, focus is immediate. Pics are great. Only thing I can not quite figure out is the link to PC. Takes a little working.

Reviews.Title: love it...
Reviews.Author: Miriam Michaud
Reviews.Content: love this camera it has more than what i read on it...takes great pictures and videos, would recommend it to anyone

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Kimberly Brugler
Reviews.Content: Love this camera.  Great zoom. Easy to use and easy to upload pictures to web.  Stays charged for a long time as well. Highly recommend!

Reviews.Title: Excellent Product
Reviews.Author: DAVID H. COTE
Reviews.Content: This Samsung product takes great pictures and interfaces with my computer very nicely. Read directions carefully and you will not have problems with taken pictures and using the computer.

Reviews.Title: Samsung Camera
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I been into photography for a few years now though not a pro I do know my way around a cameras. I am a postal carrier so I'm out in my llv for about 6 hrs a day so theres some nice shots out there some days. I wanted a small camera I could put in my bag and then hang around the truck so when a picture came up I would have it handy. This is pretty much your basic point & shoot camera it does everything pretty well, but you can match this up with your Samsung phone ( I have the S4) so you can sit this up on a tripod and use your phone to snap the picture. I've paired mine up already, and it was a breeze to do, I haven't taken a picture this way yet I wanting for it to get a little warmer and all the birds and butterflies are out but I can already imagine some nice shots with it set up this way.So all in all it's a nice little p&s; and it does take nice pictures.

Reviews.Title: Like this camera
Reviews.Author: K. Vicari
Reviews.Content: Easy to use, has lots of great features for the money, and takes great photos. I love how you can use the wifi to download your pictures and how they have an app for your phone.

Reviews.Title: Seems to be a nice little camera
Reviews.Author: Shirley
Reviews.Content: I just got this and have taken probably 50 pictures as I practice with it. It's a nice point and shoot camera and I believe it is going to work very well for my needs. It is a little heavier than I thought it would be (hence the 4 stars) but it's not something I can't deal with. I own another Samsung point and shoot that I have had for 5 years and love it except I was looking for a better zoom. This camera to me, was reasonably priced for an 18X zoom so I thought I would try it and see.Great zoom pictures! Very clear and easy to use. I read other reviews that mentioned the zoom as being slow. I did not see this. What I like best about it is that it works identical to my other point and shoot so no learning curve for me. I also read reviews about the pop up flash and I understand what they are saying. I very seldom use a flash so I don't have a problem, but if you do use one you would have to be careful. I can see how it could break. I actually like the flash on this better than my other point and shoot because the flash on it is always on and you had to physically turn it off each time you turned the camera on. A real pain.All in all I feel this is a good camera and I would recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Love the camera
Reviews.Author: Rita Blue
Reviews.Content: So far so good, no problems but I have only taken a couple hundred pictures with it thus far.... Thanks

Reviews.Title: Great camera!
Reviews.Author: L.Lewis
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera because I don't have a smart phone and wanted to upload pictures to e-mail, facebook, etc via WIFI. It takes great pictures and is so easy to operate. I can now share pictures so quickly and easily. It's the perfect size to carry with me all the time. I love that it doesn't take the standard AA camera batteries that lose power so quickly. I'm always ready to catch those special moments. It also shoots great video and has a a button just for that function. You just push the button and it starts filming immediately. The price was great too! I would highly recommend this camera.

Reviews.Title: Excellent choice!
Reviews.Author: Pragmatist
Reviews.Content: It is all I expected and more.  I am still exploring the wonders of this little dynamo.  The convenience of sending photo shots on spot via wifi is just awesome. Its lightweight.  Handy. More features than you can imagine or even care to use. Convenient usb charging. Lens protection. Zooms like a pair of binoculars. Pictures are clear and crisp like that of a professional camera.  My choice is is simply brilliant... Another winner!The only thing thats missing is a carrying case. Who said life is perfect?

Reviews.Title: very good
Reviews.Author: Héctor Gómez de Salazar
Reviews.Content: the digital camera it is very goodI haven't any problemI like because it' compactI recomend this product

Reviews.Title: i will recommend
Reviews.Author: Gideon
Reviews.Content: was on tine and pack just right the camera works great i use it as a back up to my dslr

Reviews.Title: Wonderful camera
Reviews.Author: Ronald Parrales
Reviews.Content: The photos are of excellent quality, has many functions and is the best I can enable wifi and immediately upload them to facebook

Reviews.Title: Great until zoom broke
Reviews.Author: james grayson
Reviews.Content: The image quality is excellent. Quick turnaround for the next shot. The zoom is very good, but after a couple weeks of use it locked up on me. Since Amazon.com is so great, I have a new one on the way to replace the broken one. I think that I wanted a replacement and not a refund says a lot here too. I've owned and used quite a few cameras, and this one is packed with cool features. The touch screen is brilliant, the wi-fi option is awesome for quick sharing of pictures, you can link it to you phone for sharing that way, and it takes standard SD cards, so memory is cheap to obtain. Battery life was very good in the time I used it. I think the only drawback is the potential for zoom durability, but I could have just had a bad one. Let's hope so. Overall, this is a winner.

Reviews.Title: Needs viewfinder
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer "maine--iac"
Reviews.Content: I really like this camera but find it hard to see the screen to take outdoor shots, all I see is my own reflection !! Wish it had  a view finder that you could look through , other than that it is fine .

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: Shellie
Reviews.Content: Its great! I love it! Like the color, features, zoom, touch screen, its a good camera. I would recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Great camera!
Reviews.Author: Robin Aylesworth
Reviews.Content: I bought this to have a more portable camera than my bulky Nikon. I love the quality and features of this little guy!

Reviews.Title: I love the camera
Reviews.Author: Sandra L. Nuelken
Reviews.Content: This is my third..my first two broke when I dropped them. I love the special effects and ease I can work the camera. Bought the warranty as it was much cheaper than a big box store charges and it seems as I get older I drop the camera more often than the grandkids...

Reviews.Title: Our favorite camera.
Reviews.Author: Dan C
Reviews.Content: We like to just point and shoot, we are not photographers but the results we get with this camera say we are.  Outstanding pictures, videos and the transfer to our phone or tablet makes this a perfect set up.  The battery has always lasted longer than we needed, even with taking videos.  A key to digital cams is the speed of the SD card.  Get one that reads at at-least 40 megs and you will get great results.

Reviews.Title: bella
Reviews.Author: ydac "ydac"
Reviews.Content: Excellent I loved and liked a lot the camera has lots of features, I lleó one week ago and still I have discovered the camera functions. To all my family and friends liked it, so practical, easy to handle and very low price. I recommend them for sur

Reviews.Title: Wow
Reviews.Author: Michael DeLeon
Reviews.Content: What a great camera for the price. Comes with tons of great features and functions very well. No complaints. 5 stars

Reviews.Title: great camera
Reviews.Author: C. Anneken "kool troll"
Reviews.Content: very ergonomic, sharp pictures, samsung quality,  Samsung WB250F Smart Wi-Fi Digital Camera (Cobalt Black) easy to charge by just plugging in micro USB cable.

Reviews.Title: Good for the price
Reviews.Author: ArBoLar
Reviews.Content: Excelent camera for the price, I highly recommend it. This camera really meet my expectations considering what I pay for!

Reviews.Title: Samsung WB250F 14.2MP CMOS Smart WiFi Digital Camera with 18x Optical Zoom,...
Reviews.Author: sir4
Reviews.Content: This is a great little camera. The manual reads like a manual. It can do anything I want it to do. And it is easy to download since it has WiFi.

Reviews.Title: Good quality, good price
Reviews.Author: James B. Osbon "Jim"
Reviews.Content: I am a new owner but cannot fathom how to transmit a video longer than 30 seconds.  Most of what I want to send is about three minutes.  No solution yet.  If you know, send answer to ozbn@aol.com.I got the white camera because it is easier to discern the gray writing on white compared to the usual black camera with dark letters. The main two reasons for me wanting this camera are the zoom (18x) and the ability to email a picture directly from the camera, the way a smart phone does.  No more having to download a batch of pictures to the computer, then emailing them as another step.I also bought separately a small white hand-held tripod from Amazon (Manfrotto brand) which I use with this camera.  It allows for a sure handhold while punching buttons on the camera, giving me real stability when I shoot a video, with the advantage of being sure that I won't drop the camera accidentally.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful
Reviews.Author: Lady T
Reviews.Content: I love my camera i am a beginner photographer and this camera has helped me enhance my skills, it is light weight I love the rechargable batteries. The zoom is wonderful the flash is fantastic, the price was also very reasonable. I looked at other websites and they wanted to much for this. I also love love love the touch screen

Reviews.Title: I love the camera!
Reviews.Author: Linda
Reviews.Content: It meets all of my expectations.  I would recommend.  Still learning everything about it.  It has alot of features.Very nice.

Reviews.Title: Great compact camera
Reviews.Author: Rita Bassler
Reviews.Content: I'm still learning about all of the features but the pictures I've taken so far have been fantastic, they are sharp and clear. I did go online and print out the information on the camera and how to use it, I found that easier than the little booklet you get with the camera. I have no complaints with the camera. Easy to use, the battery last a long time, great pictures, love the touch screen.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Richard L. Moore
Reviews.Content: This ia a fantastic camera, especially if you travel and need something to fit in your pocket or put in your purse.It will do anything you want, photography.Very, very good !

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Edgar Salas
Reviews.Content: 18x Zoom For This price and amazing video quality! Can Be used with smartphones to take pics. Smart mode is really cool!

Reviews.Title: Awesome!
Reviews.Author: J. Green
Reviews.Content: What an awesome camera!  The options on this thing is amazing.  Takes great pics, great videos...can't go wrong.  Definitely buy!!!!

Reviews.Title: Awesome Camera
Reviews.Author: J. Hollinger "Beachgirl"
Reviews.Content: I wanted a point and shoot camera that was good quality and had some ability to adjust to your own settings and this absolutely fit the bill. It connected easily to my WiFi network, (which was the main reason I wanted it) and I enjoy sending pictures via Email or posting to my Facebook account. I also love the 18x Optical zoom....great close ups. Also love that you can zoom while shooting video.Great camera at a great price. Love it!

Reviews.Title: Best camera I have ever owned
Reviews.Author: Janice RP
Reviews.Content: Clear, sharp pictures.  Unbelievable quality and awesome functions.  I bought this as a gift for my husband's 60th birthday.  But it was more of a gift to myself. Wonderful product.

Reviews.Title: Samsung WB250F Smart Wi-Fi Digital Camera (Cobalt Black)
Reviews.Author: sebabs32
Reviews.Content: I totally love this camera. touch screen. the videos are totally amazing. Small and can be easily carried about, and this doesn't prove a disadvantage as i have big hands however, as per flash, its quite uneasy as you have to press the button for it to pop up, besides I still haven discovered the option for forced flash (I hope it has). this is the only reason am giving it a 4 star.

Reviews.Title: Camera work great
Reviews.Author: Desert Romer
Reviews.Content: Am still learning to use some of the features of this camera. It can do a lot of things that I may never need but have the option of doing if I want to take the time to learn. I really just needed a point and shoot. Do like the zoom feature it works really well, the camera takes very clear sharp pictures. Would recommend it to family and friends. Bought a Samsung because I think they put out a good product.

Reviews.Title: easy
Reviews.Author: Emma Jonsson
Reviews.Content: the camera is very easy to use and it's perfect to just have in your handbag, so you can take good pictures whenever you want and the wifi connection is great, so you can very easily upload you pictures or email them to your friends and family from your camera!

Reviews.Title: Easy To Use
Reviews.Author: sandawana56 "sandawana56"
Reviews.Content: I got this camera for Christmas and am really enjoying it. It came from BestBuy with a $129 deal that automatically included a camera case and an 8gb SD card. For the price this is a great camera. The pictures are bright and crisp, battery life is excellent, response time is good and low light pictures are very nice as long as you allow adequate time for the camera to capture sufficient light. I have not had any issues with the flash as other reported. The touch screen makes it very easy to adjust settings.My husband is not very technical but has been able to take great pictures with this camera and finds it easy to use. I like the remote shutter feature and the feature that allows pictures taken on the camera to automatically be uploaded to my cell phone. I have all camera pictures automatically uploaded to Dropbox so they are backed up right away.A big bonus with this camera is that I can still take clean pictures even though my hands occasionally shake. With my last camera I'd often have to take several shots before I got a clean shot when my hands were shaking. This has eliminated a lot of frustration and has made picture taking an enjoyable experience again.

Reviews.Title: Samsung WB250f fantastic camera for all levels is usrs
Reviews.Author: Joseph J. Boisvert
Reviews.Content: The camera came on time.  For the price it is loaded with both photo and WiFi options.  Very simple intuitive to use.  Unpacked it took a picture connected the camera to the network and emailed a picture in less than five minutes.  Will take much more use to exploit all the features.  I bought the white camera and absolutely love how it looks.  Great value for the money.

Reviews.Title: If you want a  great camera for a great price
Reviews.Author: Lov2read
Reviews.Content: Received my camera.and was very happy. Great quality and easy to set up. Manual is not user friendly. Battery charges quickly.

Reviews.Title: Could be better built
Reviews.Author: Jorune
Reviews.Content: I do not like that the flash is not built into the unit.  You have to remember to release it.  When it's popped up, you need to be careful. One wrong smack and that flash is going to be broken.

Reviews.Title: Super Camera for the Price!
Reviews.Author: Jeremy
Reviews.Content: Purchased this to replace old Sony camera for my mom! She is not the biggest tech person and she already has this figured out! Picture are amazing and she is happy! I will probably buy another for myself!

Reviews.Title: Good and not so good
Reviews.Author: Kathyv "KathyV-NJ"
Reviews.Content: The picture quality is excellent. There are so many features not sure anyone can use them all. Love the wifi to send picture and video right from camera. What i don't like is microphone is right on top which i keep covering as i hold the camera which then make audible on video worthless. The on and off button is so sensitive every time  i put the camera away it turns on just by a slight touch.. Some great features allow stop frame, zoom is fantastic, just to name a few. Hate that there is no manual. Online its about 140 pages and thats the english version. Time consuming to scroll to information online. At 140 pages printing not an option.

Reviews.Title: Good Camera
Reviews.Author: Cyndy Portman
Reviews.Content: I love the quality of the pictures it takes and the wifi feature that shares pictures from the camera to my Samsung phone.

Reviews.Title: Loaded with Features
Reviews.Author: Arthur Cooney
Reviews.Content: Take your shot, which is easy. Then you can send it where you want to by email. The camera is compact, fits easily into a pocket, and is ready to work (stills or movies) quickly. I like it.

Reviews.Title: It's s a great camera
Reviews.Author: Raul Vieitez
Reviews.Content: It's a great camera but it's a bit slowly when you change the configuration or change the mode you are using.

Reviews.Title: Fun Camera
Reviews.Author: FlashMan81
Reviews.Content: This is a fun camera to use with a lot of neat features, but the picture quality is not the greatest. The zoom is good and the video is fair. The picture quality is not really bad, and for the price you really can't argue. It's plenty sufficient for posting pictures on the web or sending emails for social purposes. I've used it quite a bit and had a lot of fun with it, and I would recommend it for the price you can get it for. Just don't expect more than you should with the picture quality.

Reviews.Title: Beautiful camera!
Reviews.Author: Michael Peters
Reviews.Content: Great zoom- very clear and bright pictures. This camera is easy to use and everything I hoped for in a camera!

Reviews.Title: Very versatile easy to use pocket sized camera.
Reviews.Author: Carmen Cuevas
Reviews.Content: Takes great pictures even if the auto focus seems a little slow.  Fits nicely in my hand with the grip on the right side.

Reviews.Title: Great small investment
Reviews.Author: April Jackson
Reviews.Content: I love this camera. I destroyed the first one and got another one identical to my first camera. I love the editing part of this camera. The focusing of the lens could be better...but I'll deal with it. FYI zoom in slowly to get the lens to focus better especially when you use the video camera.

Reviews.Title: Excellent camera!
Reviews.Author: Donald A. Kalina "k-line49"
Reviews.Content: Camera works with my Android phone transfers the pictures I take to the phone, you can also email the pictures to your family and friends, I love it!. It also has several shooting modes to enhance your pictures. You can also shoot video, stop and then continue on from where you left off, without starting another video. Great camera.

Reviews.Title: Camera
Reviews.Author: Linda M. Laplac "Linda Marie"
Reviews.Content: I am very happy with his camera I am still learning how it works it has a lot of ability the online works terrific

Reviews.Title: Excelente. La recomiendo 100 %
Reviews.Author: HECTOR
Reviews.Content: Excellent camera, is simply spectacular. I can upload photos directly to Facebook without wires and computers. The only detail that I did not like was the flash, for its position in the chamber is very delicate though I have not had a problem yet.

Reviews.Title: Samsung camera
Reviews.Author: hamgirl
Reviews.Content: Love the camera and the quality of the photos and the ease of use but I would have liked to have had better instructions that were a little easier to navigate

Reviews.Title: Excellent camera
Reviews.Author: George J. Partington "scribbler"
Reviews.Content: I primarily selected this Samsung camera because of it's ability to upload photos directly to email and internet.However , it is a very good camera in terms of taking great pictures. What more could one want?

Reviews.Title: The charger came with this is not for US so useless.
Reviews.Author: Ki Hyung Song "ki song"
Reviews.Content: The quality is good. I like the features. But I don't know if this product is for US. It seems like it's for China or somewhere else. Anyway it uses standard micro usb so I can use it with my phone charger.

Reviews.Title: Good choice
Reviews.Author: Russell Dayton
Reviews.Content: I researched many similar cameras, spent several hours before choosing this camera. I think I made the right choice. This model is easy and simple enough to use even for a novice like me to use. Yet has many really good features. R.D.

Reviews.Title: Good technology but bad function
Reviews.Author: Bethan Williams "annattasiaaa"
Reviews.Content: I give it three star because the camera has a nice size, is light and you can e-mail pictures or share them online directly from your camera.  Also, it takes crystal clear picture ( day or night) as long as your object does NOT move.  So the slightest move and you get a blurry picture.  I bought this camera to take pictures from my 3 year old son....the only pictures that turn good are the ones I take when he is in asleep!

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Jon D. Skorich
Reviews.Content: This is a great camera with loads of smart features. The built in wifi and compatibility with apps for quick transfer to phones & tablets is a brilliant feature. The image is great. Takes good video as well. Definitely a lot of bang for your buck.

Reviews.Title: Great camera with easy share options.
Reviews.Author: Hugo H. Carrejo "Nando"
