Reviews.Content: I've had other compact Cannon Powershot cameras and this Samsung easily is the overall better compact camera. Takes great pictures with different option settings that are easily comprehend able and accessible. Very good zoom and WiFi sharing directly to your email or transferring to or from your smartphone with the Samsung Camera app. Editing options are very cool as well with cartoon mode and such. Battery life is good and low light pictures look great with flash. Very decent shutter speed as well considering it is a compact camera, not a DLSR.. For the price, hard to beat a camera like this.

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Vijay Dandur Rajanna "vijayrajanna"
Reviews.Content: I have not used this much, but initial impression is great.I was mostly impressed by the zoom 18x factor.

Reviews.Title: Samsung Camera
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "Computer DOC"
Reviews.Content: Good price on a Quality Samsung product, but returned it for exchange for the Android Samsung Camera, which gave me additional features.

Reviews.Title: pretty good camera
Reviews.Author: multanii
Reviews.Content: So dar everything has worked and its a great little camera. The only thing odd is the cartoon mode sometimes its great other times its kinda ehhh.The WiFi ability is very useful especially since my gf who this was a gift for does not have internet or a working computer to upload otherwise. So she just uploads over WiFi at my house.

Reviews.Title: Amazing little camera
Reviews.Author: dachshund1
Reviews.Content: This little camera has all the bells and whistles you could ever need. The pictures quality is great and auto focus is so easy to use. Makes Grandma's pics look like a pro.

Reviews.Title: Great camera for the money
Reviews.Author: Rich B
Reviews.Content: Easy camera to work, the best feature is , it's quick focus and quick exposure.The bright color allows you to find the camera quickly

Reviews.Title: New Camera
Reviews.Author: Ronald W.
Reviews.Content: This camera meets our needs and seems to be very user friendly. Taking it on vacation in a couple of days and looking forward to taking lots of excellent pictures.

Reviews.Title: Wife Loves it
Reviews.Author: Randy Bordelon
Reviews.Content: Good little camera for the price.  Gave it to my wife as a present because she wanted something small instead of always lugging around her SLR camera.  She loves this little thing.  Has a lot of features especially for editing pictures.  The best feature of all is the WIFI capabilities allowing for sending pictures directly to your phone.  You can also email them or use social media which is a cool feature as well.

Reviews.Title: Nice features and simple use
Reviews.Author: Henry
Reviews.Content: I bought this for two reason.1. Samsung's smart features2. bounceable flash - Like tilting it back...I love that I can manually adjust the flash by tilting it, but because it's on the same side as the shutter button its hard to have it bent and press it at the same timeIt might be annoying that you really have to press on the flash button to get it out but given I use this in bright environments It isn't too big of a problem.The smart features Samsung put in is very useful for when I was filming a video for my channel(check that out on [...]) remote viewfinder and others are all rolled into one app on Google called Samsung SMART CAMERA App ([...]) other apps don't work.... the way you use remote viewfinder and others is by launching the feature you want on the camera and the phone just does what camera asked it to do. The Direct Link button is programmable so change it to you liking.Overall it makes great camera comes with features you expect from a point and shoot.I am using this pormerily as video camera you want to check the quality of the mic and stuff you can check them out on my channel on youtube ([...])

Reviews.Title: Great low cost camera
Reviews.Author: Daryl W Johnson
Reviews.Content: The 18X Optical zoom works great. The battery life is good and the photo quality is good.I haven't spent any time on the detailed settings yet and the flash armature is a little funky but for the money, this is a very good out door use camera.

Reviews.Title: Really Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Miranda Jackson
Reviews.Content: Bought this Camera at Best Buy and it is great, it is just so beautiful. It takes really good pictures as well. Just like any device their are buttons that you just have to press to know what they do. I'm so happy i got this and I'm just going picture crazy and taking pictures of anything.

Reviews.Title: Samsung WB250F 14.2MP CMOS Smart WiFi Digital Camera with 18x Optical Zoom,...
Reviews.Author: Donald
Reviews.Content: I purchased the camera locally when the retailer price matched Amazon and I needed/wanted it quickly. I did some research and the camera seemed to have all the features, including WiFi. Especially important to me was the long zoom ration of 18x. All seems to be going well with the camera and I purchased a 16 gig. memory card with it . I was a bit apprehensive about a plastic camera body, but it is not really a negative. The camera is a plus over most smart phone cameras because of the higher quality lens and certainly the zoom ratio. I would say that, for the money, this is a good buy and I am, thus far, happy with it.

Reviews.Title: Worth the price
Reviews.Author: Andre Luiz Saidy Clemente
Reviews.Content: The camera is great, but it looks very fragile. Especially the flash. It's worth the price, though. Also does no include memory card or case.

Reviews.Title: Very fun Tech
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I really like this camera. It is fast, takes clear and fast pictures, and the zoom is really good for a point and shoot sized camera. I love that it links up with my Samsung Note 2 phone and I can share pictures between the devices and even use my phone and a remote control to make the camera do basic commands like take pictures.Although it does have all these options and bells and whistles, it is still easy to use as a basic point and shoot camera as well. Just turn it on, set it to Auto and go!

Reviews.Title: Cathy from Michigan
Reviews.Author: WBrink
Reviews.Content: I gave these camera's as a Christmas gift to my daughter and son, and they love them....easy set up ,easy to use ,A great camera!

Reviews.Title: Awesome Camera very easy to use and shoot pictures
Reviews.Author: Frankie Wilkins
Reviews.Content: Love the professional looking pictures this camera takes. Battery is good and strong. I took well over 200 pictures before I needed to charge. Love the fact that you can upload your pictures via wifi is also awesome straight from the camera.

Reviews.Title: Good Lens and connect it inmediately to Iphone Hot Spot
Reviews.Author: Rafael Perez
Reviews.Content: Good Lenses and connect it inmediately to Iphone Hot Spot for inmediate posting to FaceBook. Smartphones and Iphones are good but cannot compare with the optical lens and flash of the WB250F.

Reviews.Title: Great!
Reviews.Author: James Herbadon
Reviews.Content: The Samsung WB250F Smart Wi-Fi Digital Camera, 14.23 Mega Pixal with 18x zoom is a really good product to buy.

Reviews.Title: Nice camera for the price
Reviews.Author: Robert Westphal
Reviews.Content: The 18x zoom is one reason we purchased this camera.  The zoom feature is difficult to use.  The control to zoom in/zoom out does not operate as expected.  It continues to move even after removing your finger from the control lever.

Reviews.Title: GREAT CAMERA
Reviews.Author: mitch
Reviews.Content: I feel for my purposes this was a great value and more camera than I will ever get to know.  The only thing missing on this camera is verbal guide so you can really utilize all the features packed into this camera.  Highly recommend.

Reviews.Title: Nice camera
Reviews.Author: Daniel Driscoll
Reviews.Content: Very nice unit feels like it was made with quality in mind. Could have used more of a users manual or a Quick start guide covering more camera functions. They covered the wifi part but assumed we know what the buttons and icons mean.

Reviews.Title: Instruction camera videos setting
Reviews.Author: Victoria's Fashion Online Store
Reviews.Content: This camera is good for picture taking  but not taking videos. This camera do not have instruction of how to adjust the videos setting why videos only take for 30 seconds. Can anyone tell me how to adjust because the camera package did not include full instruction.

Reviews.Title: Great!!
Reviews.Author: Jose C.
Reviews.Content: Love it! All the features are very useful and the pictures and video come out great. It is a very good value for the price.

Reviews.Title: good camera for the price
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: This camera has not too big nor too small. The optical zoom and pictures taken have good resolution. I like the wireless feature which allows transfer of images wirelessly to any blue tooth compatible devices.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Jeff
Reviews.Content: As a photographer, I have a D7000 but my wife doesn't like to use it because of it's size and intimidating buttons.  We saw this camera and thought that this has just about everything you really need in a point and shoot.  The wifi is a great bonus as well as the touch screen.  I did have a bit of trouble with emailing photos to others from the camera but it seemed to sort itself out.  I love that I can import photos to my computer with a push of a button.

Reviews.Title: Quality, Features, and Style
Reviews.Author: Duke Leto
Reviews.Content: This camera has it all. Though lacking the megapixels that would take a picture the resolution of your living room wall, this camera is everything you need. The zoom is a bit slow compared to a physical method, but it's almost a rifle scope. The apps you get for this phone are quite superb, and uploading photos to your favorite cloud storage site is a breeze. If you're looking for a point-and-shoot that's packed with better quality and a plethora of features, look no further!

Reviews.Title: nice compact digital camera taking great pictures
Reviews.Author: Caroline Mast "Caroline"
Reviews.Content: I picked it because it looks like the easiest digital camera to operate.  I hate all the technical gadgets on cameras. I just want to take pictures of my dogs as they grow and play and send them out t my friends. It is very easy to transfer the pictures from the camera to the computer which I really enjoy...One thing, there are so many different dials and things you can do, I just leave it on auto and go from there. I probably will start experimenting on different things that the camera can do as I get more comfortable using it.

Reviews.Title: I LOVE IT!
Reviews.Author: Alex Schroeder
Reviews.Content: I have to admit that when my mother bought this camera, I was a bit jealous.  I had been keeping an eye out for a decent camera because my Nikon Coolpix camera had failed on me.  I did tons of research on cameras before deciding I'd just get the same model as my mother.  It is just the perfect camera for a beginning family.  I use it to take tons of pictures of my son, as this is his first year of everything!  I love the touch screen-it rarely glitches.  The biggest seller for me was the 18x zoom in a compact camera.  Wow!  The second biggest seller was the WiFi connection.  I am constantly sending pictures to family through email from my camera.  The different settings and editing options are so fun to play with.  The panorama setting makes taking a panoramic picture SO easy and quick.  Bottom line:  this is the perfect camera for someone who enjoys decent quality pictures, but isn't too concerned with all of the details that professionals are.  It's great for capturing the life of a family.

Reviews.Title: Doesn't focus/take pictures fast enough
Reviews.Author: Savanna D. Wright
Reviews.Content: This was my first Samsung digital camera purchase and I haven't been impressed.  I'm normally a Cannon customer, but when my screen went black and I couldn't see the pictures I was taking I decided to try something new.  The Samsung camera as a whole seems okay...zooms good, nice big screen, etc.  My biggest problem with it is it has a slow reaction to focus and I can't take quick pictures one after another.  I don't know if I'm not using it right or what but I'm definitely disappointed about that.  I have five children and it's frustrating when I miss a good shot because for whatever reason the camera just won't take a picture.  It's almost like you have to have a little waiting time before it will allow you to shoot again.

Reviews.Title: battery life
Reviews.Author: Kayla Foster
Reviews.Content: I've only had mine a few days and I bought it from walmart. And the battery life is terrible does anyone else have that problem??? Like I'll turn it one once and use it for a few minutes put it down pick it up a few hours later and it'll be dead. Does anyone have any suggestions??? Love everything else but the battery life.

Reviews.Title: Awesome Camera!
Reviews.Author: Harman Dhuck
Reviews.Content: I must say it's worth the money! The wifi feature of this camera is so cool, i don't need to open my laptop just to transfer photos to my iPad. I can do it directly now. It captures near excellent quality photos for a point and shoot camera category. You will always going to love the zoom of this camera, it doesn't ruin the quality of the photos.

Reviews.Title: its my best buy ever!
Reviews.Author: Gaston Losardo
Reviews.Content: its an amazing camera, realy! perfect pictures, with a lot of modes, the 1080p record mode its almost perfect, i recomend use it with a tripod, the sound its perfect.

Reviews.Title: Great camera for the money
Reviews.Author: Doris
Reviews.Content: Love this camera. Does just what I wanted it to do.I wanted a camera that I could take a picture and e mail it or directly upload it to face book without needing to plug it into the computer. Having a lot of fun with it.I hated that there was no instruction book but playing in the menu was very easy to figure out

Reviews.Title: Good value, easy to use, many advanced functions.
Reviews.Author: Interested Golfer "Bill"
Reviews.Content: Very easy to set up and use. After charging the battery, I was able to set up the wi fi connection and send a test picture to my email account and access my Facebook account in the first 15 minutes.The documentation is sparse, but if you play with the controls and aren't afraid to try this and that with them, you should be able to get the basic functions going quickly. Keep in mind that the icons at the bottom of the viewing screen are touch sensitive and using them will save you time.I downloaded the user guide from the Samsung website and it goes into a lot more detail for the more advanced functions.Originally I was going to replace my old Panasonic Lumix with a new one, but when I saw this Samsung camera for a much smaller cost and with the wi-fi function, I decided to try it and I am glad I did.

Reviews.Title: Great value as the price drops (WiFi, Touchscreen, 1080p video, 18x optical zoom)
Reviews.Author: amazonshopper00
Reviews.Content: I bought this mew on a Black Friday 2013 doorbuster in-store for under $100.I've played with this camera for a few hours, and I have to point out that the  WiFi function is better than expected.I've read many reviews with people talking about the problems they've had uploading to anything but Facebook or e-mail. I've had no such problems. I uploaded my videos and pictures to a selected folder on my hard drive using the autobackup function. I'm able to just press a few buttons and walk away while all media that hasn't been uploaded before is uploaded right where I want it to go. This feels a lot more convenient than taking out my SD card and sticking it into a SD card reader every time.There's a lot of variety with the picture taking modes. They seem easy enough. I tried the low-light mode; it worked pretty well. Will need more time to try things out.The touchscreen "hybrid" is pretty cool. I like being able to touch when I want to or use the touch pad when I want to.This is a pretty camera, too. It doesn't look or feel cheap at all. The interface screens are cool. I also bought this camera because I wanted the 1080p video capability. This is an upgrade over 720p videos.

Reviews.Title: Good pictures but somewhat complicated.
Reviews.Author: Mutt
Reviews.Content: Very pleased with pictures but the interface with computer could be better . The wi-fi  is easy to use for emailing a picture but to get several  I always connect with the cable.  These problems could be my fault.

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: Lisa
Reviews.Content: This is a great camera, but I had to send it back because it wouldn't charge. I got another one and so far it works great !the zoom is really good, still trying to figure it all out :)

Reviews.Title: Works great
Reviews.Author: Gavin Boone
Reviews.Content: Everything works as well as advertised. We have taken all kinds of pictures from family portraits tolandscape to wildlife photos. We have zero complaints. Great bang for the buck.

Reviews.Title: Good Quality pictures with lots of extras
Reviews.Author: Dexternights
Reviews.Content: Got this camera for my wife over similar priced Nikon/Canon for the extra features and Zoom. Was little doubtful on the quality, but very happy after a weekend getaway, low pictures came great and touch screen Wifi options are very helpful.The ability to take picture with touchscreen reduces the shaking effect while using button and ability to control the camera through smartphone will also reduce any motion. Wifi functionalists like email and Google + are a plus.

Reviews.Title: Very nice, compact camera
Reviews.Author: dhaynie
Reviews.Content: I love this camera, as much as my husband will let go of it... does not zoom quite as much as we would like, but it is very nice.

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Frank311
Reviews.Content: Good device, excellent performance, really light! internet works perfect and fast! i can easily send my pictures by mail through a wifi... i recommend it!

Reviews.Title: Very good pictures, balky zoom
Reviews.Author: gary
Reviews.Content: Works very well for me. Sometimes the zoom is balky. Starts up quickly. I enjoy the artsy templates. Good quality sound.

Reviews.Title: Ok
Reviews.Author: enrique padilla
Reviews.Content: I've previously owned another Samsung camera, was expecting for this model to be better. Unfortunately I'm disappointed, motion pictures have not been 100%, blurry, & unfocused. I'm hoping features have not been fully explored yet. If not,  I'll be using older model I have used before buying this model.

Reviews.Title: Nice
Reviews.Author: JB
Reviews.Content: This is a pretty nice camera. It takes nice pictures and zoom function is nice for a camera this size. Set up wasn't too bad but also isn't the most straight forward. Automatic backup over wifi worked but it took a while with me playing around with the software. Very Nice buy for the price I paid.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: C. Calderon
Reviews.Content: Takes good pictures for what is worth, you need to do a little retouching after uploading to computer. Not all but a few. This is my second Samsung camera (other one is TL500) and I do recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Samsung WB250F
Reviews.Author: Kevin Sullivan
Reviews.Content: Picture quality is solid for a camera in this price range.  Telephoto lens tends to continue to adjust momentarily after release of the control.  Some concern with the latch lock for the battery and memory card compartment.  It's not recessed and could open without much contact while in a pocket.

Reviews.Title: samsung smart digital camera
Reviews.Author: jason mccleaver
Reviews.Content: camera is what i hope it would be, camera came threw mail and is working fine thank you jason nice pic's

Reviews.Title: Really like my new camers.  May never learn to use so many featues.  Had to go to internet to get the instuction manyal
Reviews.Author: edward j penn
Reviews.Content: May never learn to use so many featues.  Had to go to internet to get the instuction manual but that worked.

Reviews.Title: Great camera at a good price
Reviews.Author: Dale "DaleDJ"
Reviews.Content: For a compact camera with an 18x zoom this seems to be a great camera. (Bought one for a relative and liked it so much I got one for myself.)The image quality is very good, but obviously not as good as an SLR with a large sensor.The camera works well in it's automatic modes and has a number of little gimmicky modes that I doubt I will ever use.The WiFi capability is very nice. It allows you to backup your photos to your computer with only a few button presses on the camera after first installing the listening software on the PC. The photo sharing to Facebook works, though, it puts all photos you share in the same Facebook folder. Email works well. You can control the shutter from your WiFi connected phone with the appropriate Samsung app installed on the phone.One feature that I'd like to see is a time lapse option, either on the camera itself, or via the phone app.The manual shutter speed goes up to 16 seconds.

Reviews.Title: Excelente
Reviews.Author: Crispina Deudedys Laya De Martinez
Reviews.Content: I like this camera, it's the best smart camera that I could to have, all fine, I dislike haven't money to give one to my parents

Reviews.Title: Camera
Reviews.Author: D. H. Talley
Reviews.Content: This is a small, easy to take along digital camera with very good close-up ability.  Only issue that makes me say bad words on occasion is that sometimes the close up keeps moving after I take my finger off the point where I want it and miss a shot.  Nothing terrible and I am glad I bought it

Reviews.Title: Wonderfull Camera
Reviews.Author: gaston4kd
Reviews.Content: Great features, including a wonderful zoom. Zoom mechanism is slow, but wifi functionality is incredible. Samsung needs to have a more comprehensive set of companion apps on iphone and Windows Phone Platforms.

Reviews.Title: Piece of crap
Reviews.Author: Thomas Czarnecki
Reviews.Content: Zoom function broke after one use. Quality was not what was expected. Will submit for warranty fix as we have had this for under two months.

Reviews.Title: Battery Drains Too Quickly...Flash Seems Like It's Just Waiting To Break Off...
Reviews.Author: RyanArch
Reviews.Content: I'm giving this camera a 2-star rating for several reasons.  The first being a crazy fast battery drain while shooting video...I shot 20 minutes of 1080p video and took maybe 25 flash photos and the battery was in the red...and since there is no stand alone wall charger for the removable battery you're stuck carrying the charging cord and wall wart everywhere you go.  I needed this camera to last through a full day if possible...and was easily able to drain the battery in just a couple of hours.  The second reason is that while it is a "smart camera"...I found that it is constantly shifting modes while in 'auto'...resulting in some fairly odd looking photos where plenty of light was available and the flash should not have been thrown...or images that were too dark when you would think the flash should operate.  Which leads me to the third reason...the pop-up flash...this (while perhaps a neat feature)...seems like it could easily snap off due to such a small mechanism...and I found myself having to take pictures several times in order to use the flash...the first shot I would forget to engage the small button to release the flash (I'll admit operator error here)...the second to retake the picture...and a third try to get it right....this is nonsense...I've got small kids and they don't sit still forever.I had high hopes based on some of the reviews...but in all seriousness...some of the settings and gimmicks make this camera seem more like a toy fit for a kid.Should've went with my gut and bought the Canon 330HS.

Reviews.Title: Great Value
Reviews.Author: Frank G.
Reviews.Content: This point and shoot camera has fair to good picture quality.  The connectivity with other devices, optical zoom, and large lens in my view make this camera worthy of purchase and unbeatable for the price.

Reviews.Title: But not for me
Reviews.Author: Gail C. Lyon "library lady"
Reviews.Content: It is a great camera but not for me.  I guess I will always need an eye piece lens thingy.

Reviews.Title: I love this camera
Reviews.Author: Jan
Reviews.Content: It takes amazing photos even at a distance.  I love that when I am home, it automatically picks up the wifi and I don't have to connect to the computer to send photos to facebook,email, etc.  I have had it for 3 months and I keep learning new things I can do with it.  It is a wonderful product, glad I got it at a discount, and just love, love, love it.  I have three vacations this year and I am happy that I will be taking amazing photos!

Reviews.Title: Mixed review
Reviews.Author: Susan M. Mahoney
Reviews.Content: I love the ease of use with this camera and the picture quality is awesome. One of the main reasons I purchased it was for the wifi capability and the feature allowing me to automatically download pictures to my PC without hard wire connection. I have attempted this many times with no luck and have contacted Samsung support several times and had less than stellar help from them. I love the camera, but am frustrated in the sought out feature that I can't get to work.

Reviews.Title: Easy to use
Reviews.Author: Browntown girl
Reviews.Content: Takes great photos; My eleven year old child was using it hours after she opened it without assistance.  Takes great photos and nurtures her creative side with all the edit options.

Reviews.Title: So far, so good
Reviews.Author: Insectophile
Reviews.Content: Hasn't seen extensive use yet so this review will be updated later.Purchased straight from Amazon (not third-pary) and was received in a factory-sealed box.So far...PRO* Touch screen response is great.* Wireless Auto Backup works well (although it's not truly "auto" because you still have to choose "auto backup" from a menu on the camera, and the camera cannot be used for any other purpose while the backup is ongoing).* Motion Photo feature is great fun* In-camera email and Facebook functions are easy to set up and use* iOS app for using iPhone as remote shutter performed nicelyCON* Difficult to get a non-blurry shot handheld when zoom is above 9X in AUTO mode (no matter how steady I try to hold it).  This is less of a problem using my Panasonic Lumix with similar zoom range. Both tout image stabilization.* The white wrist strap was missing from the box. To get a replacement strap I spent nearly an hour on chat with a Samsung rep who kept telling me the serial number on my camera was invalid. Finally, after emailing him photos of the number on the box and the number on the camera he agreed to ship a replacement.  The strap arrived promptly but it was gray and not white.**Not yet sure how the photos taken so far fare until I download them for analysis.  More later...

Reviews.Title: Good point and shoot
Reviews.Author: Yu-jin Chia "Yu-Jin Chia"
Reviews.Content: This is the second Samsung point and shoot camera I've owned, the previous one being a DV300F dual-view. That one was rather unique in having a front-facing LCD that makes it a lot easier to take selfies. It served us well for some time, but one day we found out the hard way that the zoom mechanism is very fragile. It was dropped from a pretty short distance and the whole thing jammed up. I disassembled the camera and repaired it myself, but from then on the autofocus was a wee bit wonky.The WB250F is similar in some respects, different in others. It has the same wi-fi options, no dual view, but touchscreen controls and 18x optical zoom (the DV300F and most other point and shoots are 5x). The zoom is probably the most notable feature of this camera, as it's exceptional for a point and shoot. Some others can reach that level with combination optical/digital zoom, but digital zoom in general is pretty awful- I'd say it borders on useless due to degradation in quality.The camera is surprisingly responsive for the cost. It has decent shutter speed and zooms quickly, and the touch controls respond fine. You can touch to focus just like a smartphone, which can be useful if the AF is misbehaving. That said, autofocus seems relatively fast and smart for a point and shoot. The zoom works very well- you can take close-ups of objects at long range with very good quality. It's not quite as good as a DSLR with a telephoto lens, but hey- that's not what you're after if you're even looking at this.The flash is pop-up, and it works okay. I have noticed it tends to be a bit too powerful at close range, but that's a problem with many point and shoots. The body itself is a tad on the bulky/large side for a point and shoot, but by no means unmanageable and still a lot smaller and lighter than most mirrorless cameras. It has button controls that can perform all functions alongside the touchscreen. The camera charges via micro-USB input and comes with an AC adapter. It uses full size SD, not micro-SD like the DV300F. It has built-in wi-fi for sharing pictures, and also shoots excellent full HD (1080) video.I got this on sale for $100 and at that price I'd heartily recommend this camera for anyone looking for a point and shoot. Even at MSRP, it's easy to recommend due to the big pluses: excellent zoom, wi-fi enabled, and convenient touch control that it doesn't force you to use. The zoom in particular makes this camera 'useful,' in the sense that it's a lot better than any cellphone camera. On the downside, it is a bit bulky (though not heavy) for a point and shoot- many of the other options out there are a lot more pocketable. I also know from previous experience that the zoom mechanism is fragile- be very careful when handling it and don't put any pressure on it. Lastly, battery life is so-so (no small wonder, you'll probably be amazed by how tiny the battery is). To some degree this is an issue with all EVF cameras, but this one (and it seems, most Samsung cameras in general) seem a bit worse than average. It's not terrible, but you may need to charge on the go if you're planning to use it all day. The good news in that regard is there's an abundance of external battery packs out there that you can easily use to charge the unit without an outlet.

Reviews.Title: A very satisfied customer!
Reviews.Author: Rose Gonzalez
Reviews.Content: I chose this rating because it's what I have been looking for.  It offers more than just a camera.  It also offers the luxury of a video for those "cute" pet adventures to share with others.  Plus it's simple enough for the inexperienced photographer to enjoy and share with family and friends and make it look as if you aren't such a novice (even if you are).

Reviews.Title: not good quality action shots
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I enjoyed the wifi abilities with this camera, very easy to do and convenient.  I did not like the picture quality.  Even with changing the settings to decrease shutter lag, the action shots did not turn out the way one would hope.  I returned this camera.

Reviews.Title: Samsung Camera
Reviews.Author: Spiritforce
Reviews.Content: My friend had a Samsung WB250F and I was impressed with the digital screen and close up of a flower that she had taken. However, I take photos of my art work and the clarity wasn't that great but it seems to perform OK on most pictures.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: James Neglia
Reviews.Content: I adore this camera. Perfect size, wi-fi capabilities are excellent, filters, options, lens - it has the entire package at a price that is friendly to the consumer. I can recommend this camera without reservation.

Reviews.Title: are first samsung camera
Reviews.Author: edwin feyrer
Reviews.Content: we don't use a camera all the time , but fore the ease of taking pictures this is far better then are old one which was Kodak the photos are clear and bright and the color is perfect I would recommend this to anyone looking to buy an inexpensive camera I have other Samsung products an think its a great company with great products  ed feyrer

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Nita
Reviews.Content: Love this camera, didn't think I would like the touch screen but it is really nice. Close up pictures are fantastic. My complaints, turn on and off switch is flat with camera so hard to find. The knob that control what kind of picture you take is easily moved. So every time I take it out of its case, it has turned to a different setting. Wish it had a little more zoom but for the price it is a great little camera.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Camera
Reviews.Author: Galia G.
Reviews.Content: It is everything I was expecting for. Great pictures and camera features. The equipment is light and easy to use at any moment. I am glad I choose this model.

Reviews.Title: i love it
Reviews.Author: REYNALDO DEL ROSARIO
Reviews.Content: thanks, the price is right and my wife like it very much. The item is so nice and good to use.

Reviews.Title: Excellent choice at great price
Reviews.Author: Gregory Krauth
Reviews.Content: Compact, smooth operation. Fairly simple operation. Haven't taken it to the rugged backwoods yet, but expect it to hold up well.

Reviews.Title: Samsung doesn't guarantee satisfaction.....Rip-off
Reviews.Author: Shirley Ramos
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my vacation to Europe.  On day 3, the zoom lens was stacked and can't use the camera at all.  Called Samsung tech support when I got back from vacation but tech support cannot help, saying that the serial number doesn't exist.  Weeks later, I got an email from Samsung tech support, asking for serial number again.  I responded to the email but I did not hear back from Samsung ever again.  It's been 6 months. What a rip-off.  I ordered this camera through Amazon.com and was shipped from Beach Camera.  Will not buy any camera from amazon.com, never again.

Reviews.Title: Does NOT come with memory card!
Reviews.Author: Bookman
Reviews.Content: No memory card makes this unusable to take photos when you receive it!  That should be clear upon purchase!!! You have to spend extra money to make it work!!!

Reviews.Title: good enough as a travel camera
Reviews.Author: Grace11
Reviews.Content: nothing particularly special, some photos come out blurry but I do have shaky hands, can't always focus at the zoom i want to, is a bit jerky. Works for a pocket camera.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera for a Mom Like Me!
Reviews.Author: BFlo
Reviews.Content: I'm beyond thrilled with this purchase. I'm in no way a professional photographer, nor do I understand most of the technical lingo of all of the camera features/abilities.I wanted a camera that succeeded the quality of my smartphone, and could capture photos of my little boys while they're running around. I hate that my phone camera doesn't like fast moving toddlers, so thank you Samsung WB250F!Compared to my husband's old point and shoot camera, I'm amazed at how far these cameras have come. I love scrolling through all of the fun features. I especially appreciate the fact that I can upload my photos directly through wifi to social media and to my phone!My camera came safely packed with a wall plug, USB cord, wrist lanyard, and a manual (although, I haven't used the manual yet because this camera shows tool tips with everything if you hover long enough).

Reviews.Title: It Passed My Rigidity Test
Reviews.Author: Green Iguana
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera out of necessity; my Fuji HS30EXR was in its third month of service and I was looking for a quick CMOS replacement. I am happy to say that this camera performed very well during a recent trip that included beaches, sand, rain, mist, waterfalls, low light and occasional bumps.The Samsung WB250F's body is metallic. This is a definite plus because the camera feels much more sturdier and is much more durable than its plastic body cousins. I find its grip to be more than sufficient as well. In fact, there is a small thumb rest positioned on the rear of the camera. Besides having a CMOS sensor, one of the main selling points of this camera is definitely its zoom capability. I have to point out that it zooms slower than a snail crossing a road when recording video. I believe there is a setting to make this camera zoom faster, although you will sacrifice zoom speed with motor noise. I did not find zooming during video to be too much of an issue because I mainly used this camera to take photos with.This camera's zoom capability is a good selling point (as I mentioned in the last paragraph). To me, the zoom seems crisp and is exceptional in many situations. I have bumped this camera's body and I have even bumped its extended barrel. After such treatment, the camera still did its duty and worked for me. There were also other elemental conditions in which this camera was exposed to. I have taken photos in many situations (including situations with high humidity) and this camera has performed flawlessly. I didn't notice any difference in shutter speeds or processing times in adverse environments. The battery life is pretty good as well. Although there is no information on battery life, the battery that this camera uses seems to last a long time before needing to be recharged.There are more great things about this camera (such as touch screen and WiFi), but I chose to write this review based on the camera's capabilities as a camera. This camera did not disappoint me on my trip and I do not think it will disappoint you.

Reviews.Title: 160 page operator's manual for a "Point and Shoot" camera?
Reviews.Author: Harold R.
Reviews.Content: The camera works well in "auto" mode and the wireless upload to my PC is terrific. This 79 year old will probably never learn to use all the other features. The on line manual is daunting.

Reviews.Title: Sports mom
Reviews.Author: a old fashion parent
Reviews.Content: Was very happy with the variety of ways to share the pictures and quality of them along with photo options.  This is by far a great gift for a sideline mom at sporting events that does not want something bulky.

Reviews.Title: Very nice
Reviews.Author: WILLIAM
Reviews.Content: Very nice camera. I can take clearlly  pictures including objects at 200 m. Also I can load pictures to my cloud or email via WIFI

Reviews.Title: Looks great, but takes blurry pictures
Reviews.Author: Jill Somers
Reviews.Content: Not happy with this camera.  I ended up returning it for a Canon.  I had trouble uploading and using the wifi function.  More of a headache than anything.  Sorry Samsung...I usually love your products.

Reviews.Title: Sooooo SATISFIED!
Reviews.Author: Shana
Reviews.Content: This camera is amazing! I was expecting it to actually look different Because,  i only got it at about a third of the price. Thank you so much!  What i was looking for.  The features of WiFi and connect to smart phone and take pictures and save to phone gallery. ... Are amazing!  Never seen anything like it.  I able to edit send the pictures via email, facebook, youtube, and skydrive which means i can retrieve them in the cloud with my lap top and tablet with my Microsoft account. I'm am s satisfied with the condition and everything was brand new.  Thanks again Amazon!

Reviews.Title: Terrific little camera but pop up flash died
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "Mtngirl"
Reviews.Content: Warning: pop up flash refused to pop up after 2 weeks, so I am returning the camera. Too bad because it's a terrific little camera.Pros: lots of great software in camera, good image quality,  touchscreen interface is excellent,  fun to use, wireless is perfect,  small sizeCons: must focus, then refocus on some shots, hesitates just like the computer that it is when it is going from one input to another, pop up flash won't pop up after 2 weeks of use.

Reviews.Title: Not for me
Reviews.Author: Terry Sz.
Reviews.Content: I really do not care for this camera at all.Seems balky to use and looks and feels cheaply made!It is going back!

Reviews.Title: samsung digital camera
Reviews.Author: Ellen M. Hyatt
Reviews.Content: The photos are not as clear as my digital Panasonic. I would have stayed with the Panasonic but it got dust particles on the lens that could not be removed and showed up as black dots on the printed photos.. Several friends had the same problem so decided to try another camera. I even took the camera to 2 repair shops that told me it was a common problem with Panasonic and had just got one in the day before. I would not recommend the Samsung to friends. Most operating buttons are difficult to see also.

Reviews.Title: Nice camera
Reviews.Author: Al
Reviews.Content: The only knock I would give it is that it has capacity for 1 picture in the internal memory and does not come with an SD Card to increase the memory.  I gave this to my daughter for Christmas and she was unable to really use it until we went to the store and bought a memory card. I don't really remember if that was offered in the product information but would have been an important tidbit to add if not.

Reviews.Title: Good camera
Reviews.Author: Ricardo Otarola
Reviews.Content: I made a mistake and ordered it on White when I wanted it black. But any way it is a really good camera that can interact with the rest of the Samsung product line.

Reviews.Title: VERY NICE
Reviews.Author: Kelvin Walker
Reviews.Content: I AM VERY PLEASED WITH MY PURCHASE. THE ONLY PROBLEM I HAD WAS THE CASE I ORDERED DID NOT FIT THE CAMERA. THE CASE WAS TO SMALL

Reviews.Title: Good camera, not so good user interface
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Great optics and great pictures.  Only problem is it is not very obvious to use.  You need to dig through the menus.It needs to be like my phone, when I walk into a Wi-Fi area that I've used before, it should automatically link up.

Reviews.Title: Camera
Reviews.Author: Jim
Reviews.Content: The camera I purchased was a great camera.  It worked great for taking all types of pictures.  I give it five stars on the ratings chart on this review.

Reviews.Title: Good Product.
Reviews.Author: Richard Mendoza "BPS"
Reviews.Content: is a very good product, would recommend. The zoom is excellent, the image is impeccable, my need for the product is perfect.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful!
Reviews.Author: C. Hylton
Reviews.Content: The best camera ive ever used.... Its simple and does everything it  says.... battery life is great.... last forever... pictures are sharp!

Reviews.Title: Wi FI love it.
Reviews.Author: Gerry H. Santerre "gerr"
Reviews.Content: Great pics.Loades to facebook easily.Wi fi is awsome.I only wish i could have more than one account on it at once.

Reviews.Title: Good buy
Reviews.Author: Rosanne Bonaventura
Reviews.Content: I'm still learning the ins and outs of this camera.  Yo can get an app which makes it easy to transfer pictures from the camera to your computer.  This is a big plus.

Reviews.Title: Sometimes dead when connecting with the WIFI
Reviews.Author: Not interesting
Reviews.Content: Sometimes dead when connecting with the WIFI, and I have to take out the battery to stop it working. But it's a very pretty camera anyway in white!

Reviews.Title: M'eh
Reviews.Author: brechmos
Reviews.Content: The zoom is great and the pictures are all right.  I do have some issues with this:- The flash does not automatically popup in low light conditions. You have to manually pop it up. (Stupid)- I can't update the firmware using the software Samsung provided for Macs. I contacted their help people and he told me I had to use a Windows machine.  Really?- The WIFI auto backup is the same issue. You have to have a Windows machine.- The pictures aren't great, tend to be a little blurry unless you have the flash on.  But for a small camera I guess they are fine (my prev camera was Canon G10).I honestly hoped for more given it was a Samsung.

Reviews.Title: Confusing
Reviews.Author: James C. Brolin
Reviews.Content: I returned the camera because because the minimal direction were very confusing.  I was especially interested in the WiFi addition to the camera but there were no instructions on how to use it.  It may very well be a good camera, but I am not a good enough technician to use it.  Too bad.  I want my money back and have returned the camera.

Reviews.Title: SNAP IT
Reviews.Author: Jammsac
Reviews.Content: Super good deal. Pictures are clear and defined. there are some neat and cool features. i will recommend this product.

Reviews.Title: Coul have been good
Reviews.Author: Geo
Reviews.Content: I replaced my old cameras with this one.  I like it in white as it looks sporty.  However;  they seemed to have forgotten one basic but big feature, image stabilization.  Ive been taking pictures since I was a child and always have to pics thst everyone wants. Now, too many pictures come out blurry. Looking into it further,  I noticed the camera doesnt have image stabilization.  After practice and being very aware of being extremely still I can take ok pictures.  However, every time I ask someone to take a group picture with me in it, they are always blurry.  Sadly I got crappy christmas pictures that I will never get the chance at again.

Reviews.Title: CAMERA WITH INTERNET
Reviews.Author: customer H
Reviews.Content: Best Camera Ever--I got it to do all of things mentioned that it does, though most I don't use daily but it is dependable and takes great pictures!

Reviews.Title: Quality
Reviews.Author: gabalot
Reviews.Content: I gave this camera five stars because the company was top notch to work with and I returned the camera without a hitch and refund was fast.  I just didn't research it well enough to know that it didn't have some of the features I was looking for.  I wanted a view finder as an option and a removable lens and didn't like the flash.  For the excellent price of the camera it is a great camera.  It did show error twice regarding "not enough memory" for the photo but that could have been the old memory card I used or user error.

Reviews.Title: The wifi Connection Experience Could Be Better
Reviews.Author: G. Bennett
Reviews.Content: You have to let the camera and the iphone each time you use the camera. Then tell the phone it's okay to transfer each time. I was hoping to be able to shoot away and have all the pictures on the phone. It does have a flash which makes it a bit better than my iPhone for photos, but not the experience I was looking for.

Reviews.Title: BROKE WITHIN 3 MONTHS!!!
Reviews.Author: Cara
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera to take on a once in a lifetime trip around the world and it broke within 3 months!Now I can't click to return it via Amazon because it's past the return, there doesn't seem to be anyone I can email regarding this faulty product. Its TERRIBLE customer service and the LAST time I will buy from Amazon.I was so sad, I was in India with the most incredible opportunities to take photos, a chance I will never have again and this NEW camera broke.Please can someone contact me to help me and try and fix the huge inconvenience this caused.

Reviews.Title: meh
Reviews.Author: david marcinkowski
Reviews.Content: Tbh. My phone is faster and takes clearer picture. The camera is plastic but rigid. Works exactly like advertised. No problems 3 months into purchase.  Next time will buy higher end model.

Reviews.Title: INSTRUCTIONS ARE NOT GOOD ENOUGH !
Reviews.Author: Ken Hunter
Reviews.Content: camera is just fine; however, the instructions are terrible!!! For example, I made a mistake entering the date/time data and there are not instructions about how to RESET...downloaded 160+ page users manual and there are none there either. ...Whar a pain in the rear!

Reviews.Title: Did not come with charger that works in the United states
Reviews.Author: kman65
Reviews.Content: Camera seems to be fine, however the charger is not for us in the United States. Suggest you verify before purchase.

Reviews.Title: NO MEMORY AT ALL!
Reviews.Author: valerie carter
Reviews.Content: How can a camera have absolutely no memory? I read all the reviews on this camera and was very excited when it arrived.  I love the features that it has and most especially the capacity to share pictures with my iPhone.  After taking one single picture, the memory was full! I realized that there was no memory card included and no built in memory either.  I went online and ordered some additional accessories including a battery charger, memory chip and case.  In the meantime, I can not really use the camera efficiently despite installing the Samsung camera app on my phone and being able to share the pictures with my device because so far- I can only share one picture.  Very frustrating!

Reviews.Title: Each Shot is a Gamble
Reviews.Author: Dean 1900 "Dean 1900"
Reviews.Content: It takes a good photo.However. It comes with no documentation.And the larger viewer is basically unusable in most kinds of light. You aim the lens in the general direction of the object, and hope for the best.I never would have ordered it, if I knew there was no documentation and so often no way to see what you are photographing.Picture quality is good. But just about every name brand offers good picture quality.

Reviews.Title: Camera is always dead/down
Reviews.Author: Lee Ann
Reviews.Content: Quality of the camera is very bad. We've been using Canon camera w/ 7.8Magapixel and 3.8X optical zoom since 2007, this camera is supposed to be an upgrade and come out to be much worse. The camera is always dead/down (like a computer doesn't have enough ram and become dead) while we switch in modes or between modes, or even try to zoom in and out. The Direct Link botton is located right at the holding spot, so when holding the camera to take a picture, most of the time this botton is pressed without you knowing it. The touch screen is not sensitive at all, I keep touching it and no response come out, really hate it!  The Picture qualilty is so so, even with a much larger resolution, the quality is no better than my 2007 Canon camera. I have samsung phone and headphone and like them, and that's why I want to trust the same brand, but it is a really disappointed product.

Reviews.Title: Buyer beware - good pix but TERRIBLE uploading options. Not recommended.
Reviews.Author: E. Goldman
Reviews.Content: Do not buy this lousy POS. The only reason it gets 2 stars is that it takes really goof pictures BUT uploading your pix afterwards is nothing but misery. The WiFi connection DOES NOT work as advertised. If you want to upload to your computer you have to go thru a very messy and convoluted process. NOTHING about this camera is simple.

Reviews.Title: Not happy at all
Reviews.Author: Brendastarshine "BookBabe48"
Reviews.Content: Wow- what a disappointment.  Will probably go back to my $99  6 year old little pocket Sony.  Almost impossible to not get blurred photos if any motion at all is involved!  The zoom mechanism is jerky and time-consuming to focus and oddly placed; NO manual comes with it and I shouldnt have to download a 40 page document to find out how to work the dang thing.  Thought I was moving UP but this is almost more trouble  than its worth.

Reviews.Title: just absolutely horrible
Reviews.Author: htp
Reviews.Content: Every camera takes good photos.  My 10 year old Olympus was great.  I bought this camera to make it easier to transfer photos and videos to cloud storage.  It is completely inept at this.  WiFi direct is incredibly erratic, you have to reestablish the link almost every time.  The smartphone app is horrible and also erratic.  I am using a Galaxy S3, you would think this would be a natural communication.  Also, Samsung tech support has been absolutely awful.  My GS3 experience was great, this camera is a disaster.

Reviews.Title: It arrives damaged.
Reviews.Author: Bercelino J. Ramirez
Reviews.Content: The flash is not working. Appears to be previously opened, looks like a camera used in an exhibit.Very dissapointed.

Reviews.Title: I think I would have liked it if it worked.
Reviews.Author: Susan
Reviews.Content: I received the camera and charged it and turned it on and the screen was so bright you had to turn it straight down to be able to see the screen.  I called Samsung they walked me through the routine and decided it was defective. I got a refund because I needed the camera faster than the could get me a new one. If it had a good screen I think I would have liked it.

Reviews.Title: camera
Reviews.Author: so sweet
Reviews.Content: Idid not have any luck with this camera and I depended on it when I went to Europe. It did not fuction properly for a new camera.

Reviews.Title: did not recieve this item
Reviews.Author: jeevan
Reviews.Content: i never got this item when i purchased for expedited delivery for a gift the delivery guy made a very poor choice in delivering this item by leaving it at my front door bc when i arrive at my door the item was not there. this item never got to me.

Reviews.Title: choose it in white
Reviews.Author: G.Erbamm
Reviews.Content: Where to start? Truly if there were minus stars this would be a good time to use them. Clumsy lay out ugly piece of plastic looks like it came freshly printed out of a cheap 3-D printer. Underlined by a plastic bullet screw mount that surely won't survive more than a couple of weeks.  Horrible image quality barely living up to the camera of a high class smart phone, flat washed out colours, mostly overexposed and almost never sharp. The highly praised WiFi capability is very slow often not working at all and to make matters worse every time you want to use it, lose the connection (happens about every five minutes) or simply have closed the app and want to go into it again you have to go through the entire cumbersome connection process. I promise you will be so happy that the camera came with a USB cable to use instead. You are much better of, infect it works twice as good, to buy yourself a WiFi SD card.If you still can't help yourself and really have to buy this camera at least choose it in white you may be lucky leaving it on your fridge one day to never see it again and if you belong to the unlucky ones like me that bought that piece of *#$$ already just use it as a sinker on your next fishing trip.

ProductInfo.Features:
Capture Detailed Images in Low Light situations with a 14PM BSI CMOS Sensor
Share your Best Photos Instantly with Family and Friends with Built-in Wi-Fi
18x Optical Zoom
3.0 TFT LCD Screen
Samsung color designation is "Cobalt Black". Black refers to the color of the lens. Camera color is a dark blue.
ProductInfo.Name: Samsung WB250F Smart Wi-Fi Digital Camera (Cobalt Black)
